Nu gok nix doo lextoo re gu bkayaa gu xaa, nu wen gok gu lo xaa, nu lo re xaa nak kwenta lee xaa,
Lee re xaawin nzhaal gon xaa xtizh xuz xaa nu xtizh xnaa xaa, nel snee nyula Xaa Nabeyy.

Nzeen nu naz leen lextoo nu lee rese kwaan mle nu lo re myet yizhyo, mle nuya tub mod nali nu kwaan dub lextoo nu, nel Dios mle yudar nu, zee masra mle nuya lo re gu. Nu kwaanzee nix doo nzhak lextoo nu, nel kwaan mle nu lo re gu namlet nuya mod nzhak xaa yizhyo ne nel Dios mle yudar nu.
Loka xaa kayaa re kwaan nabeey na nu le xaaya, nlu xaa wlipa nkela xaa na. Nu lee Xuz na nkela xaa nu noka na nkela xaa nu nlu na na lo xaa zee labeyy wen xaa na.

Lee re myet yizhyo ne mbezh lee kwaane nlu mod tub kwaan wen, nu ngozhaw xaa re kwaan nabeyy re xey xaa, nu nle xaa mod tub xaa nadoo, nu nted doo xaa bid kwerp cheen xaa. Per tira nanont kwaan kale xaa, nel nyent mod saaw re kwaane kwaan nzhekla kwerp cheen xaa le.
Leezha nkasa re xaa Jesús, xaa nzho yezh ne, mzaa re xaa ne kwent xomod mkela lu xaa. Tubka kale lu yudar xaa reke xaa xnaz Dios, kwaane nyula Dios.
Nagont lu re wdizh kwaan nachan nu nagont lu xtizh re xaa kwaan nzhekla dildiizh lo rese kwaan tira nanont, nel nebse dil nyizhal lo kwaan ba.

Kwaanzee lee lo re be nyentra ler kwaan nsaaw garlo be, nak be mod tub spej kwaan nlu xni cheen Xaa Nabeyy, nu Mbi Naban cheen Xaa Nabeyy kachee be, zee gak be kwenta lee xaa, zee kad mbizh nzhiroo be lo xni cheen xaa.

mas non xren Jesucrist. Nel lee Jesucrist, mod mle Mbi kwaan tira mban yudar xaa, mzaa xaa leeka lee xaa mod tub gon nali doo lo Dios, zee kwaan xren xaa le xaa gan mle nzhul xgab cheen be lo re kwaan mle be yilo, kwaan nle zee nya be naz lo yalgut, lee nal nzho mod kee be zhiin lo Dios, xaa tira mban.
Kwaanzee, chelee Dios mzaa lo re xaa kwaan mzaa xaa lo be, gorna mwii be lo Jesucrist Xaa Nabeyy be, nyent mod yé na nawent kwaan kale Dios.
Nalet be zee gak nales lextoo Mbi Naban cheen Dios, nel lee xaa nzho leen lextoo be zee gakbeyy lee be nak xaa Dios axta mbizh kwaan zaa xaa yalnaban kwaan tira lo be.
Bselazh gu re kwaan mseed gu; nu blaa gu naletra gu kwaan nawent. Chelee gu nakoot gu mkaal lo gu, lee na yal lo gu mod tub wann, gorna tira nanlet gu xgab.
Xiin na, nalaat gu kade xaa gu. Xaa nle kwaan nali, nali nak xaa, kwentaxa nali nak Jesucrist.

Rese gu xaa nkedoola na, nalet gu krer rese xaa né: “Lee Mbi Naban cheen Dios nzho lextoo na”, nel naret mbi nak cheen Dios. Zee leezha tub xaa nii: “Lee Mbi Naban cheen Dios nzho lextoo na”, ble gu preb xaa, ne che wli xaaya. Nel lo yizhyo ne nzho zyen doo xaa nkade, nu nii xaa: “Na nak tub xaa nzaa kwent kwaan né Dios lo na”.
’Snee wech na, nzhaal ne gu lee Jesús nak xaa nzho mod chee rese kwaan nawent kwaan mle gu, mod nzaa nu kwent lo gu,
Nu nal rese gu wech nu bzan, nix doo gok lextoo gu nel xaa Jesucrist nak gu. Nu nanyachet lextoo na nii na re kwaan nguniila na yilo, nel leeya nak tub kwaan nzho mod kanap gu lo re xgab nawent.
Nu chelee tub be nlaan, nzhaal gaw be garli be, zee nakint teed Dios be bid kwent cheen xchee ne. Lee stub naz kwaan mnabdizh gu lo na, luu naya lo gu gorna bare na lo re gu stub welt.
Pilat nzhé: —Be gu xaa, nu bnaab gu kwent lo xaa, mod nak ley cheen gu. Lee re xaa mkeb nzhé: —Per lee re nu, xaa Israel, nanzeyalt gu gut nu tub xaa.
Kwaanzee re gu nzhaal yula gu kayaa gu re kwaan mas wen, kwaan nzelazh Dios. Nal luu na stub naz kwaan mas chul lo re gu.
Nu kwaanzee Jesús nak ngwleyy non doo cheen re be. Lee xaa nak tub xaa nali lo Dios, nu tub xaa nanzebt jwalt, nu tub xaa nambey, nu tub xaa xa nak lo re xaa nzeb jwalt, nu tub xaa nzob naz yiba.
Rese kwaan nzho mod le na, nel Jesucrist nak xaa nzaa jwers lo na.
Kwaan nzhekla Dios nak zo be nali lo xaa, nu nik tub be nachaalt stub cho nanakt sa be.
Nu nayizhat be tubka wdizhno be Dios, tubka wii be lo xaa nu tubka zaa be dixkix lo xaa.
Gorna mbin Ches kwaane, zee mxonn Ches nu nya xaa ngu xaa yizhyo cheen re xaa Madián, pa ngu xaa kwenta tub xaa stub yezh nu zee ngol chop xgann xaa.
Lee xaabyi nanzhaalt saaw xaa yek xaa nel mdexkwaa Dios xaa mod lee xaa nu snee nlu chul nak Dios. Per lee ngwnaa nzhaal saaw me yek me, zee luu nzhon me xtizh sa me.
Nu nak be mod tubka kwerp cheen Jesucrist, nel nabeyy xaa leen lextoo be, kwaanzee nzhaal kwi wen rese be, nu nzhaal zaa be dixkix lo Dios.

Kwaanzee mle Dios Jesús tub xaa nali doo, nu lee xaa nak xaa mdexkwaa rese kwaan nu kwaan yalnabeyy cheen xaa rese kwaan nanluxt. Mle xaa Jesús tub xaa nali doo kwent cheen re bid kwaan mded xaa zee nzho mod wee Jesús zyen doo xaa, gak xaa xinn Dios, naz pa chul cheen Dios.
Kwaanzee naab na kwaane lo gu. ¿Chozhiin tant ndil gu nu tant nayii gu ne gu re wech gu nu re bzan gu? Sbaa ndil gu nel leeka leen lextoo gu nzhal re yalnzoblazh.
Nzhedizh re xaa, lee tub gu nchaal leeka sa xuz. ¡Nu kwaane nak tub kwaan tira nawent, nixa re xaa nanakt xaa Jesucrist nanlet kwaane!

Zee lee Maxuu nzhekla kiil be mod nkiil xaa rese myet yizhyo, per Dios nle yudar be nu nanlaat xaa kiil Maxuu be axta paro nayet be. Nu leezha nzhekla Maxuu kiil be, zeera luu Dios tub mod roo be, zee ye be ded beya.
Noka ne na gorna lee na nya, zyiid stub naz xaa kwenta tub ma nakap, xaa nzhekla luux re xaa Jesús.
Lee nu nix doo nzhak lextoo nu nzaa nu kwent cheen re gu lo re xaa Jesús, re xaa stub yezh, mod nye nzo gu lo Dios, nu mod tubka ngwii gu lo Jesús nixa nrenal xaa gu, nu nixa nded gu bid.
Nik tub xaa zer ne lo Dios; per chelee be nkela be tub be stub be, Dios nzo kwaan be, nu nzho yalnkela cheen Dios leen lextoo be.
Na nak Pab, nu nak na tub xaa mkayaa yalnabeyy lo Jesucrist, nu nanakt na tub xaa mxaal o mleey myet yizhyo. Na nak tub xaa mleey mer Jesucrist nu Dios, xaa nak Xuz be, xaa mseban Jesucrist.
Kwaanzee nzhaal selazh be Jesús nen xomod myela xaa ne xaa re xaa nzeb jwalt gorna mted xaa xaa bid, zee nayizhat be nixa nagaknalest lextoo be,
Chelee be ngut be tubka kwaan Jesucrist seeka roban be kwentaxa mroban xaa.
Lee stub pa lo Xkyech Dios nzhé: Bill gu, re xaa nanakt xaa Israel, tubka kwaan re xaa nak xaa Dios. [Dt. 32:43]
Per lee Mbi Naban cheen Dios né klar doo, nu nzhé: Lee re mbizh gwluzhtlaka nzho xaa laa Jesucrist. Nu gon xaa kwaan nlu re mbi mal nu sbaa reke xaa tich yalnkade cheen re mandad cheen Maxuu.
Lee lu selazh lo re xaa, nzhaal gon xaa xtizh gobyer nu xtizh re xaa nak zhiin, nu nzhaal gak xaa tub xaa gon diizh nu tub xaa tubka list nzo le kwaan wen,
Leezha snee mbezh xaa, nlu nazaat xaa yek xaa gon xaa lee yiba nzhola axta yilo, nu lee yizhyo ne mroo leen nis kwaan yalnabeyy cheen wdizh kwaan ngunii Dios.

Nu noka Jesucrist ngut kwent cheen re jwalt cheen re be, nu ngut xaa tubka welt nu tira nayetra xaa. Lee xaa nak tub xaa wen nu ngut xaa kwent cheen re xaa nawent, zee nzho mod wee xaa be lo Dios. Lee kwerp cheen xaa ngut, nu lee Mbi Naban cheen Dios mseban xaa.
Mas wen ngle re xaa zee nanglabeyyt naz nali, ke gwluzh yilo labeyy xaaya, nu bare xaa laa xaaya, nu laa xaa re kwaan nambey kwaan nabeyy Dios le xaa.
Wech nu bzan, nabeyy nu gu kwaan yalnabeyy cheen Xaa Nabeyy, bachii gu lo stub naz re wech, xaa nanzheklat kee zhiin, re xaa nakalet modxa mlu nu lo gu.
Nel kwaan mle tubka myet, xaa le Dan, mle zee mzeeb jwalt leen dubse yizhyo nu kwaanzee noka myaad yalgut lo dubse yizhyo; kwaanzee rese myet nzhet nel rese myet nle jwalt.
Nel mwii re xaa ne lo Dios, mle xaa gan lo zyen dil, nu nali mnabeyy xaa, nu mkayaa re xaa kwaan nzhé Dios zaa xaa, nu msaaw xaa roo mbezh,
Nu nixa nrenal xaa be, per natechot be nzo, nu nixa gobi xaa be per naluxt xaa be.
Gu nak mod me nto cho, nel mlaa gu Dios nel nkela gu re kwaan yizhyo. ¿Che nanet gu leezha nkela gu re kwaan yizhyo, nzhak gu xkontrad Dios?
Mded xaa yizhyo Frigia nu Galacia, nel lee Mbi Naban nanglaat ngzaa xaa kwent wdizh chul cheen Jesús re yezh cheen Asia.
Per loka xaa nzhekla zo nali lo Dios nzhaal wii xaa lo Dios. Kwaanzee nanzhaalt nii be: “¿Cho xaa yixoob yiba, kwaan nle zee yaad Jesucrist naz yizhyo?
Zee ngwa mandad yilo nu mxo xaa kop cheen xaa lo yizhyo, zee rese xaa kwaan nkano sey cheen ma nakap nu nzholl lo maj cheen ma, mlen tub yoob kwaan ne doo nu nlaxlaa doo.

Nu gorna mzen ma yech, lee dap xaa mban nu lee re xaa gol mkichyek axta lo yo lo ma. Nkano re xaa gol bagwel kwaan nzholl xaa nu nzhano xaa yann kwaan ngazhe kwaan yaal, kwaan nak mod re wdizh kwaan wdizhno xaa mle nambey Jesús lo Dios.
Rese xaa ngwii lo Jesús mod Crist, Xaa Mxaal Dios Nabeyy, xinn Dios nak xaa zee. Nu rese xaa nkela Xuz be Dios, noka re xinn xaa nkela lee xaa.
Natot be yalxwa, nakwaant be dil, nu nixa nazoblazht be cheen wechxinn be.
Nagalnot lu re xaa gol, mas wen zaa lu rason lo xaa kwaan wdizh nadoo mod xuz lu, mod wech lu bzak re xaa mad,

Kwaan be le be kwaan wen, zee wii re xaa nanlabeyyt Dios lo be. Nu sbaa, nixa nal nii nawent re xaa be, mod tub xaa nakap nak, per gorna wii re xaa lo re kwaan wen nle be, noka re xaa gool lo Dios mbizh kwaan naab Dios kwent lo re myet.
Tant nzhekla na le na kwaan wen zee mrenal na re xaa mreke tich Jesucrist, nu nyent mod gaazh xaa nik tub kwaan tich na nel mle na rese kwaan nkee lo ley cheen Ches.
Lee xaa mnabdizh: —¿Pa gor mzelo xgaan na ngokwen xaa? Nu lee re xmos xaa nzhé lo xaa: —Naaze, kan la una mroo xlee mad.

Re kwaane ngok mbizh kwaan mzelo nu ndexkwaa nu kwaan gaw nu yalni cheen Paskwa, nu lee re xaa lazh na nanzheklat keeka kwerp lo krus mbizh kwaan nzholl re nu lo Dios, nel mbizh ne nak tub mbizh non doo lo re nu. Zee ngunaab xaa lo Pilat, zee kich xaa nii re xaa nkee lo krus, nu zee la xaa re kwerp cheen xaa lo krus.

Nu gorzee lee Pilat mzelo mkwaan mod sela Jesús; per lee re sawlazh na nzhé: —¡Chelee lu sela lu xaa ne, nanakt lu xmig César, xaa nabeyy dub pa nabeyy Roma! ¡Loka xaa mbezh nak rey, nak xaa xkontrad xaa nabeyy dub pa nabeyy Roma!
’Nalenalest gu lextoo gu. Ngwii gu lo Dios noka bwii gu lo na.
Nu tira nazhebt gu ne gu re xaa nayii ne gu, nel kwaan ba nak tub nseyn lee re xaa ba telisa lux yalnaban cheen, nu lee re gu kano yalnaban kwaan nzaa Dios.
Namleeyt re gu na, nel na mleey re gu nu mza na zhiin lo gu, zee zaa gu zyen doo xle nu lee xle kwaan zaa gu dii tira. Nu snee lee Xuz na zaa rese kwaan naab gu lo xaa kwaan yalnabeyy cheen na.

Nel mwii Bel lo Dios, zee mzaa xaa tub gon kwaan mas chul ke kwaan mzaa Caín lo Dios, nu kwaanzee lee Dios mkayaa xaa mod tub xaa nali lo xaa nel sbaa mlu leezha mkayaa Dios gon cheen xaa. Nu kwaanzee nixa ngutla Bel, seetaka kalu xaa xomod mwii xaa lo Dios.
Kwaanzee nzhaal wii re gu lo nu nebse mod xmos Jesucrist, nel lee xaa mlaa zhiin ne lo nu, zee nseed nu re myet re kwaan ngulaan, kwaan mzaa Dios lo re myet nal.
nu lee re mbal yiba ngob lo yizhyo, mod nzhab ig lo yag leezha nroo mbi nye doo.
Kwaanzee wech nu bzan, xaa nkela na, tira nawiit gu lo re maj.
Nalaat be le re kwaan nawent gan lo be, sinka le be re kwaan wen zee le be gan lo re kwaan nawent.
Tubka bseed re xaa kwaane, nu kwaan yalnabeyy cheen Xaa Nabeyy guzh lo re xaa, zee nadildiizht re xaa, kwaan nanlet yudar nik tub xaa, nebse nleya zee luux re xaa nkenzhaya.
Bii be lo Dios zee noka Dios bii gax lo be. Sembey be lextoo be, xaa nle kwaan nawent nu xaa nzhak chop yek.
Kwaanzee chelee be nle nonra be tub xaa ke stub xaa, nu nanlet be kwaan né Dios, zee naab Dios kwent lo be.
Nel namrezht Dios be le be kwaan nawent, sinka mrezh xaa be zee gak be nambey lo xaa.
Nlu lee yalnayii cheen Dios nze naz yiba la tich rese xaa nle kwaan nawent nu tich rese xaa nanalit nzo lo Dios, nu tich rese xaa nanzheklat le krer kwaan wli.
Rese gu xmig na, nzhaal kela be tub be stub be, nel yalnkela nak cheen Dios. Rese xaa nkela ngol lo Dios, nu xinn Dios nak xaa, nu nlabeyy xaa Dios.
Loka xaa nii: “Na nzo lo xni”, nu nayii xaa ne xaa tub xaa sawlazh Dios, seesa nzoka xaa zee lo yalnakaw.
Byakdoo lextoo be gorna lee tub xaa nii wdizh nawent lo be kwent cheen Jesucrist, nel lee Mbi Naban cheen Dios tubka nzo kwaan be.
Pab mdizh kwaan re xaa, zeera mzelo xaa mzaa xaa kwent tubga tubga re kwaan mle Dios lo re xaa nanakt xaa Israel lo re zhiin kwaan mkee xaa.
¿Cho tub gu nzho mod né lee na mle tub kwaan nawent? Nu cheleeya nii na kwaan wli, ¿chozhiin nanlet gu krer xtizh na?
Nu noka né xaa: Nu tira yenlazh na re jwalt nu re kwaan nawent kwaan mle xaa. [Jer. 31:34]
Kwaanzee mzelazh Dios re kwaan chul cheen xaa lo re gu, axta re wdizh kwaan nii gu nu re xgab wen kwaan nzho yek gu.
Wech nu bzan, kwent cheen Jesucrist nu kwaan yalnkela kwaan nzaa Mbi Naban lo be, naab na lo gu zee tubka naab gu lo Dios zee kanap Dios na.
Lee re myet nzhé: —¡Tub mbi mal nzho lextoo lu, kwaanzee nawent nzhak yek lu! ¿Cho nzhekla gut lu?

Mlaa Dios ngut Jesucrist delant lo rese myet zee gorna mxo xaa xren xaa ngok xaa tub xaa mchee jwalt cheen rese myet, xaa ngwii lo xaa. Nel myedoola Dios ne re be nazskweeze, nu nangunaabt xaa kwent lo re jwalt kwaan mle be,
Nu nel nze nal, lee re mos nu re polisi, xaa nkanap yidoo, mzee tub bal, nu kazhe re xaa. Noka Pér nzob kwaan re xaa kazhe lo bal.
Nu ble xchiin gu kwaan mzaa Dios lo gu zee nzho mod kanap gu gu, zee nzho mod zo nye gu lo re yalnkade cheen Maxuu. Leeya nak kwenta re kwaan nzheno tub soldad lo dil.
Pér nzhé: —Xaa Nabeyy, ¿chozhiin nyent mod reke na tich lu nal? ¡Listla nzo na yet na kwent cheen lu!
Nel Dios nle zee chul doo gak lextoo gu, nu nixa nyent mod ne re myet xomod ngok chul lextoo gu. Nel snee nkanap Dios re xgab cheen gu, nu nkanap xaa lextoo gu, nel xaa Jesucrist nak gu.
Kwaan roo be nzholl be lo Xuz be Dios, nu kwaan roo be nge be lo re wechxinn be, xaa mdexkwaa Dios kwentaxa nak Dios.

Nu leezha ngunii na kwaane, nanzheklat na ngnii na, zee nazhaalt gu kwaan rese xaa nle kwaan nawent yizhyo ne, xaa nchaal stub naz sa myet, xaa nzoblazh, xaa nlewann, xaa ngwii lo maj, nel chelee gu nzhekla gu le gu kwaan ba, chol sbaa naka nzhaal tira roo gu lo yizhyo ne.
’Yilo leeka mer na mle xgab nzhaal luux na re xaa Jesús,
Rese welt ngwii xaa lo tub ngwnaa nzoblazh xaa me; nanyizhat xaa nle xaa jwalt. Nu tira nanagant nkade xaa re xaa kwaan nanyet nzo lo re xcheen Dios, nu maestr nak xaa lo yalnzoblazh. Dios xobde xaa.

Per lee xaa nebse nzhex nka nkee zhiin, gorna ne xaa lee lob nze, zee nlaa xaa mbakxiil nu nxonn xaa nya xaa, nel nanakt xaa xaa nkela mbakxiil nu nel nanakt mbakxiil xma xaa. Nu lee lob nkiib re mbakxiil lo xaa nu nchech ma re ma.
Kwaanzee nii na lo gu wech nu bzan, list zo be kenzha be, nu wen wen le be xgaba yilo keb beya, nayiit be ne be re myet sbaaga.
Nu leeka snee, lee Xaa Nabeyy nxaal loka xaa zaa kwent cheen xaa, nzhaal gaw xaa kwaan nzaa re xaa mkayaa xtizh xaa.
Na nak kwenta xni, nu myal na yizhyo ne zee wii re xaa lo na, zee nalaket xaa lo yalnakaw.
Lo lach roo yidoo zeera ngune Jesús lo xaa stub welt, zee nzhé Jesús lo xaa: —Wii, nal ngokwen lu; naletra lu kwaan nawent zee nadedt lu stub bid kwaan mas naxinnra.
Nu rese kwaan le gu, ble guya kwaan yalnkela.
’Chelee re gu nkela gu na, le gu re kwaan nabeey na le gu.

Kwaanzee nzhaal kanap be be napa lee tub be nagont kwaan kanii Dios lo be, nel chelee re xaa zee, tira nguyo xaa gorna nambint xaa kwaan ngunii tub xaa yizhyo lo xaa, mas nik tik nalet re be gan xonn be lo yalnayii cheen Dios, gorna lee xaa nzob naz yiba nii lo be nu nalet be kwaan nii xaa.
Yilo, leezha nanlabeyyt gu Dios, nak gu mos cheen re kwaan nawlit nak Dios.
Nel gorna mseban Dios Xgann xaa Jesucrist, yilotlaka lo re be mxaal xaa xaa, zee ne wen Dios re be, nu laa be re kwaan nawent kwaan nle be.
Lo re nu mlu rese kwaan mle Jesús sawlazh nu, nu nzaa nu kwent cheena. Zeera nya xaa naz Jerusalén, nu mbit xaa xaa, leezha mkenga xaa xaa lo tub krus.
Nal wech nu bzan, kwaan yalnabeyy cheen Jesucrist, Xaa Nabeyy be, naab na lo gu zee nadildiizht gu nixa narezhchot gu. Chul gu gu nu tubka lal ble re gu xgab.
Yilo lee re be ngok xaa zit nzo lo Dios nu ngok be xkontrad Dios, lo re kwaan nle be nu lo re xgab cheen be,

Bachii lo re kwaan nawent, re kwaan nzhekla re xaa mad le, nu bkwaan re kwaan nali nak, nu tubka bwii lo Jesucrist, nu bkela re myet, nu wen bri kwaan re myet; sbaa nzhaal le lu tubka kwaan re xaa nali, re xaa nzholl lo Xaa Nabeyy be.
Nu nel tubka mroban be kwaan Jesucrist, nzhaal kwaan be kwaan nak kwaan naz yiba, paro nzob Jesucrist lad li lo Dios, pa nabeyy xaa.

Lee mandad, xaa yilotlaka mkwezh trompet cheen, zee lee lo yizhyo mla yuuke nu ki kwaan nuch kwaan ren. Mzeka tub part kwaan nak chon part yizhyo, nu mzeka re yag kwaan nzeb baa, nu tira mzeka rese yix naye.
nu nzhé xaa: Nzaa nu dixkix lo lu Xaa Nabeyy, lu nak Dios, xaa nzho mod le rese kwaan, lu nak xaa ngok axta yilo, nu mzelo lu nabeyy lu yizhyo kwaan gro yalngezh cheen lu.
Jesús mkeb nzhé: —Chelee lu nlabeyy lu kwaan nzelazh Dios nu cho nak xaa kwaan kanaab nis lo lu, nu chol naab lu nis lo na, lee na za nis kwaan nzaa yalnaban go lu.
¡Jesucrist nak yalnaban cheen be! Nu gorna yaad xaa stub welt, nya be pa nabeyy xaa pa nla xni.
Per lee re kwaane mkee na, zee nzho mod le gu krer lee Jesús nak Crist, Xaa Mxaal Dios Nabeyy, nu lee xaa nak Xgann Dios, nu zee snee le gu gan yalnaban kwaan tira.
Lee be nak xinn Dios; nu re xaa nlabeyy Dios nzhon xtizh be, per re xaa nanlabeyyt Dios nanzhont xaa xtizh be. Sbaa ne be, cho wlipa nzho Mbi Naban lextoo xaa, nu cho nzho mbi nkade lextoo xaa.

Mod xkii nak xaa garlo gu gorna nzhaw xaa kwaan re gu lo yalni, nto xaa yalxwa lo re gu nu nebse lee xaa nkela xaa. Lee xaa nak mod xkaw kwaan nanyaadnot yey, kwaan nzhe mbi tub lad nu stub lad. Mod yag kwaan nanzaat xle leezha lee re yag nzaa xle, nak xaa. Nu nak xaa mod re yag kwaan tira mbizh, nu dub lox mbyiib.
Nu nzhe xaa re xaa ne nzak roo naz, nzhib xaa xaa lo loon, nel gorna lee Pér ded gola xbzhin Pér gal cho lak xaa, zee gakwen xaa.
Leezha ngwii be lo Jesús, kwaane nak mod tub lee yiib kwaan nzho yaa soldad, nu sbaa nsaaw be tir kwaan nkee wez kwaan ki yek, kwaan nkee Maxuu yenn be.
Kwaanzee rese kwaan le be nzhaal le beya kwaan dub lextoo be, mod tub xaa nkee zhiin lo Xaa Nabeyy nu nalet beya mod tub xaa nkee zhiin lo myet.
Kanap be be zee nik tub be nalet re kwaan nzhekla kwerp, nu nagakt be mod Esaú, tub xaa namwiit lo Dios nu mto xaa yalnabeyy cheen wech xaa, xaa yilo, zee mka xaa tub yann kwaan ndaw xaa.
Re xaa mbare nzhé: —¡Naselat lu xaa ba! ¡Bsela Barrabás! Nu Barrabás nak tub wann.
kade xaa re xaa nyenn xaa, nu nazhebt xaa le xaa tub kwaan nawent, nu tubka to doo xaa yalxwa, nu masra kela xaa re kwaan yizhyo per nakelat xaa Dios,
Kwaanzee Dios mle non doo xaa lo rese kwaan. Nu mzaa xaa tub le xaa lo xaa kwaan nak kwaan mas non doo lo rese myet.
Nu lee kwaan mseed nu gu, lee Jesucrist bare stub welt kwaan rese yalnabeyy cheen xaa, nanakta tub kwent o tub kwaan mgab yek nu, nel ngune nu lo yalnabeyy gro cheen xaa.

Lo rese yech kwaan mkee xaa nyaad kwaane lo, nixa nzho laka nagan doo la yek be. Per nzho xaa nawlit nlu re kwaan mkee Pab, kwentaxa nawlit nlu xaa stub naz kwaan nkee lo Xkyech Dios, nu snee nlux xaa leeka lee xaa. Nyent yek re xaa ne nu nanyet nzo xaa lo re kwaan nak xcheen Dios.
Per gorna mzeen Bernabé rop Pab kwaane, zee mchaz xaa xab xaa nu mzeeb xaa leen pa nzhi re myet, nu nzhé xaa:
Nii na lo gu, lee Jesucrist myaad mkee zhiin lo re sawlazh na, xaa Israel, zee gak rese kwaan nzhé xaa lo re xey nu, xaa yilo nu snee luu xaa lee Dios nak tub xaa wli lo re kwaan nii xaa.
Loka xaa nzak nzhool lo Dios per nanlewent xaa xgab kwaan nii xaa, nawlit xaa zee nzhool xaa lo Dios, leeka lee xaa nkade xaa, zee nanont re kwaan nle xaa lo Dios.
Bselazh gu kwaan nii na lo gu: “Nik tub mos nanont mas ke xaa nabeyy lo xaa”. Chelee xaa nrenal xaa na, noka re gu renal xaa; nu chelee xaa mbin xaa xtizh na noka gon xaa xtizh gu.
Lee Jesús nzhé lo re myet, xaa mwii lo xaa: —Chelee re gu zob gu xtizh na, wlipa nak gu tub xaa nseed lo na;
’Nu zee mla win nu yalnales lo rese yezh cheen Egipto nu Canaán, nu lee re xey be xaa yilo, nankanot xaa kwaan gaw xaa.
Nix nzhak lextoo na, gorna mbin na lee lak xinn lu nzhaze lo xnaz Dios kwaan wli, kwentaxa mnabeyy Xuz be Dios.
Chelee re sawlizh byud nu re xinn me nu re xos me nankanot xaa me, nu mlaa xaa mod mwii xaa lo Jesucrist, nu nak xaa masra nakap ke stub naz xaa, kwaan nik tub welt zer wii lo Jesucrist.
zee nzhaal bii be gax lo Dios kwaan dub lextoo be, nel ne wen be lee xaa kayaa be, nel xren Jesucrist mloo re xgab nawent yek be, nu nel myetla kwerp cheen be kwaan nis nambey.
Nebse kwaan nzhayon re xaa ne nak: “Lee xaa kwaan mrenal be yilo, lee nal nzaa xaa kwent cheen wdizh chul cheen Jesucrist, leeka kwaan nzhekla xaa luux yilo”.
Nal nii na lo gu, daw gu zee nayeta gu, nel nik tub xaa nayeta.
Nyedoola gu nded gu bid kwent cheen na nu nanyizhat gu.
Nzhaal seed lu re xaa gol: le xaa re kwaan wen, gak xaa tub xaa nzhon diizh, tub xaa nzho yek, tub xaa nye nzo lo Dios, tub xaa nkedoola, nu tub xaa nyela.
Re mbizh yilo myela Dios ne re myet, nel namlabeyyt re myet cho kwaan nawent nle re myet, per nal nabeyy xaa xaa rese pa, zee laa xaa naletra xaa kwaan nawent nu wii xaa lo Jesús.
Nu gax lo krus nzo xnaa Jesús, nu bal xnaa xaa, nu Mari sa Cleofas nu Mari me yezh Magdala.
Nu nak xaa tub lee ler noll kwaan ngok bsii kwaan ren, nu lee le xaa nak Xtizh Dios.
Per wii gu napa kale gu kwaane, zee lee re xaa nanyet nzo lo Dios kale tub kwaan nawent.
Dios nguniila lee xaa seban xaa lo re xaa ngut, zee lee kwerp cheen xaa naluxt, nel noka nzhé xaa: “Za na lo re gu re kwaan myaan na lo David, kwaana nali nu wli nak”. [Is. 55:3]
Mbizh zee lee re gu ne, lee na nzo lo Xuz na nu re gu nzo kwaan na, nu na nzo kwaan re gu.
Snee mod ne be, chelee be wlipa nlabeyy be xaa, chelee be nzhon be xtizh xaa.
Kwaanzee nii na lo gu, yet gu lo re jwalt cheen gu, nel chelee gu nanzakt gu lee na nak Xaa Mxaal Dios Nabeyy, yet gu lo re jwalt cheen gu.
Zee myun ngwnaa ne lo na, nzuzh me kwaan ren cheen re xaa mle nambey Jesús, nu cheen re xaa nzaa kwent cheen Jesús. Nu gorna myun me lo na, mdedyall na.
Nu ne wen be, lee mas gwluzh nzhekla xaa naab xuz xaa kwaan gak lo xaa per nyentra moda, nixa mbinn xaa nu nzhekla xaa kayaa xaa yalnabeyy cheen wech xaa, xaa yilo stuba.
Lee re myet mdildiizh. Lak xaa mbezh: “Nak xaa tub xaa wen”; per zlak xaa mbezh: “Nanakt xaa tub xaa wen; nebse nkade xaa re myet”.
Nu lee yalngezh cheen Xaa Nabeyy nzo kwaan re xaa zee, kwaanzee zyen doo xaa mzelo ngwii lo Xaa Nabeyy.

Dios mleey nu, nu mzaa xaa zhiin ne le nu, zee zaa nu kwent wdizh chul cheen xaa, kwaanzee nzaa nu kwenta. Nu nankwaant nu nix gak lextoo re myet ne nu, lee nu nkwaan gak nix lextoo Dios ne nu, xaa nlabeyy lextoo rese be.
¡Per dixkix Dios, mla xaa be lo yalgut kwent cheen Jesucrist!
Ngwnaa, me wlipa nak byud, nak me mlake techolalsa, nu tubka nkambaz me le Dios yudar me, nu tubka nzhedizhno me Dios zhe nu yaal.
Axta nal nik tub kwaan zer naab gu kwaan yalnabeyy cheen na; naab guya zee kayaa guya, zee chul gak lextoo gu.
Kwaanzee chelee tub be, leezha mrezh Dios be, nak be tub mos, nalet be xgab, per cheleeya nzho mod laa be nagaktra be mos, nzhaal laa beya.
Re xaa ne nak xaa nle chop tant re xaa. Nzhake xaa tich re xgab cheen xaa nu nayot Mbi Naban cheen Dios lextoo xaa.
Mdedyall doo na gorna ne na lee re gu mbin stub wdizh kwaan nzak gu nzaa yalnaban, ta mlaa gu Dios, xaa mrezh gu kwaan yalnkela cheen Jesucrist, nu mkayaa guya.
Kwaan be mod kwi chul be kwaan rese myet; nu kwaan be zo be nzhul lo Dios, nel chelee be nanzhult be nyent mod yun Xaa Nabeyy lo be.
Jesús né lo re nu: —Bchep gu xkyeez gu leen nis naz lad li kano, zee yiga mbal lo gu. Sbaa mle nuya, nu zee nyentra mod koo nu yeez, nel zyen doo mbal nguga.
Nel lee kwaan non nak, gon be xtizh Dios nexa chol nzho be beyy o nanzhot be beyy.

Chelee be mkayaa be yalnzhak zaa be rason lo re wech nu lo re bzan, nzhaal zaa beya tub mod chul. Loka be mkayaa lo Dios zelazh be tub kwaan lo stub xaa, zelazh beya kwaan dub lextoo be. Cheleeya lo be mzaa Dios nabeyy be lo re xaa Jesús, nzhaal nabeyy be tub mod nali. Loka be mkayaa lesla be ne be re xaa nkin tub kwaan, le be yudar xaa kwaan dub lextoo be.
Zee mnabdizh xaa lo re xaa zee: —¿Che mkayaa gu Mbi Naban gorna mzelo gu ngwii gu lo Jesús? Rese xaa mkeb nzhé: —Nixa nanet nu nen che nzho Mbi Naban.
Nu chelee tub xaa nanzaat yek gon kwaan né nu lo yech ne, bwii gu ne xana xaa ba nu nazhaalt gu kwaan lee xaa, zee ton xaa.

Kwaan nzhekla na nii na lo re gu wech nu bzan, nak tub kwaan ngulaan axta yilo: Lee kwerp kwaan nak baal, nyent mod repa pa nabeyy Dios, nu lee kwerp kwaan nlux nyent mod zhaal kwaan re kwaan nanluxt.

Nanzhaalt kwaan gu kwaan gaw gu kwaan nandiit tira, sinka kwaan gu kwaan gaw gu kwaan tira ndii nu kwaan nzaa yalnaban kwaan tira lo gu. Nel na nak Xaa Mzhin Ngok Myet zee za na yalnaban kwaan tira lo gu, nel Dios, xaa nak Xuz na, mzob sey cheen xaa cho na, zee ne re myet lee na nak Xgann xaa.
Nu leezha naab guya lo Dios, nankayaat guya nel nanalit nzhak lextoo gu gorna ngunaab guya. Snee nankayaat guya nel lo gust yizhyo nzhekla gu le xchiin guya.
Nu lo rese kwaan, zaa be dixkix lo Dios, xaa nak Xuz be kwaan yalnabeyy cheen Jesucrist, Xaa Nabeyy be.
Snee mle Abraham, nel nkee lo Xkyech Dios, nzhé: “Abraham mwii lo Dios, kwaanzee Dios mkayaa xaa mod tub xaa nali”. [Gn. 15:6]
Nu lee yezh nankint mbizh nixa mbee zaa xni, nel lee xni cheen Dios nu xcheen Mbakxiil cheen Dios nzaa xni.

Per lee re be nangwiitra be lo re kwaan yizhyo ne, lee re be ngwii lo re kwaan nak xcheen Mbi Naban, chelee be wlipa nzho Mbi Naban cheen Dios lextoo be. Xaa nanzhot Mbi Naban cheen Jesucrist lextoo, nanakt xaa xaa Jesucrist.
Per stub lad, chelee re sawlazh na zelo xaa wii xaa lo Dios, bare Dios zob xaa lugar cheen xaa stub welt, nel Dios nkano yalnabeyy zob xaa xlugar xaa stub welt.
Nu roo re xaa ne nik tub yalnkade nangut; nel nzhul nak re xaa lo Dios.

Per kwaan nii na lo lu nak; lee na nkee xchiin Dios cheen re xey nu, kwentaxa nzaa Naz Kub cheen Jesús kwent, kwaan nii re xaa ne nawent. Sbaaka kale na nel nle na krer rese kwaan nkee lo yech cheen ley nu re kwaan mkee re xaa mzaa kwent kwaan nzhé Dios lo lee xaa yilo.
Nik tub kwaan nanzhaalt zeb be lo stub xaa. Per kwaan nzeb be nak yalnkela lo wechxinn be, nel loka xaa nkela wechxinn nle xaa rese kwaan nzhé ley.
Nu rese myet nguk kwaan bal dox ne; nu ngunii re xaa nawent nak Dios, xaa nkano yalnabeyy lo rese yalzi ne; nu nanet xaa laa xaa naletra xaa re kwaan nawent kwaan kale xaa zee gool xaa lo Dios.
Nu lee roo wri yezh nzob tub bla ndok nu ya nzeb nu nkano chiibchop pwert nu kad roo tub pwert nzo tub mandad; nu lee roo pwert nkee le re chiibchop dii cheen Israel.
Jesucrist mdix re jwalt cheen be mod naab ley kwent lo be, nel mxobde Dios xaa kwent cheen re be, nel lee Xkyech Dios nzhé: “Dios nxobde rese xaa nzhet nkenga lo yag”. [Dt. 21:23]
Nu nzak na ne re gu, lee yilo leezha mreke na tich rese kwaan nak cheen sawlazh na, nu mrenal na re xaa Jesucrist, nu tubka mle na xgab lux na xaa.
Zee mzen xaa waz, ma noka le Mball Wiz Gox, mer ma kwaan nak Maxuu nu Dyab, nu mkado xaa ma kwaan kaden tub mil liin.
Per zee nzho tub xaabyi, xaa le Simón, xaa ngok wezh yilo nu mkade xaa re xaa yezh Samaria, nu mle xaa mod tub xaa non doo.
Kwaan nzhekla na nak mas labeyyra na Jesucrist, nu kano na yalngezh cheen yalnroban cheen xaa. Nu listla nzo na deed na bid modxa mded lee xaa bid, nu axta listla nzo na yet na modxa ngut xaa,

Nu nazhibt lu yaa lu yek tub xaa sbaaya, chelee lu zer le wen lu xgab, leezha zo lu xaa gak xaa tub xaa gol, xaa nabeyy lo re xaa Jesús. Yilotlaka wen wen nzhaal labeyy lu xaa, zee ne lu xomod nak xaa, zee nayizot lu jwalt cheen xaa. Sbaa tubka nzhul zo lu lo Dios.
Nu sneeka nzhaal seed lu re ngwnaa gol gak me tub me nkela Dios, nu nakwaant me diizh, nixa nagakt me nguy. Nzhaal luu me kwaan wen,
Kwaanzee chelee xaa chelya xaa kwaan me gak sa xaa, me nkela xaa, wena; per chelee xaa nzak xaa mas wen nachelyat xaa, wenra nle xaa.
Leeka be nkade be leezha mbezh be nkenzha be xtizh Dios per nanlet beya; mas wen le beya.
Gorna ngulo mded re kwaane, Jesús nzhaze re yezh yizhyo Galilea, nanzheklat xaa ya xaa yizhyo Judea, nel baa nzhekla re sawlazh nu gut xaa.
Per leeka Dios mleey be zee zhaal be kwaan Jesucrist, nu sbaa nkano be yalnzhak cheen Dios, nu gak be nzhul lo xaa. Nu mloxcho xaa be lo yizhyo nu mloo xaa be lo yalgut.
Zeera mlo xaa nis leen tub bandej, nu mzelo xaa mdeeb xaa nii re nu, xaa mseed lo xaa, nu nsekwizh xaaya kwaan tway kwaan mzhi xaa leen xaa.
Kwaanzee yilo mrenal na re xaa kwaan nzhake tich Naz Kub cheen Jesús, zee gut na xaa. Kwaanzee mchep na xaa lozhyib, nexa ped ngwnaaya o xaabyiya.
Snee ngok rol myet kwent cheen Jesús.

Gak be mod tub xaa nkanap re xmbakxiil nu kanap wen be re xaa Dios, nel mlaa xaa xaa lo be zee kanap be xaa. Le be kwaane kwaan dub lextoo be mod nzhekla Dios, nu nalet beya nel nle xaa jwers lo be nixa kwent cheen demi, le beya kwaan dub lextoo be.
Lee yalgut nabeyy lo re myet nel nle re myet jwalt, nu lee re myet nle jwalt nel nyent mod le xaa kwaan nzhé ley cheen Ches.
¡Wii gu, nangixt gu kwaan mka re xaa mkee zhiin lo gu, zee lee re kwaan kabazhe xaa mzhinla lo Dios, xaa ngezh doo!
Kwaanzee blaa gu rese kwaan nawent: re yalnkade, nayét gu le gu tub kwaan nu le gu stub kwaan, nazoblazht gu, nixa nagawyixt gu wechxinn gu.
Lee ngwnaa me nkano sa, nzhaal gak me nali lo sa me dubse mban xaa; per chelee xaa yet xaa, me ne nak tub me libr, nzho mod ka me stub xaabyi kwaan nzhekla me, per nzhaal gaka kwaan tub xaa Jesús.
Mlaa rop xaa re kwaan wli, nu mbezh xaa lee re xaa Jesús, xaa ngut, ngulola mroban stub welt. Nu sbaa nlux xaa mod ngwii stub naz xaa lo Jesucrist, nu nle xaa zee lee re xaa Jesús nle chop xgab.
Nel chelee be tubka nzo be kwaan Jesucrist, nanont yo xaa beyy o nayot xaa beyy cheen sawlazh na. Lee kwaan non nak le be rese kwaan kwent cheen yalnkela, zee nlu ngwii be lo Dios.
nu ngok xaa tub xaa nali doo, nu lo re kwaane mle zee ngok xaa tub xaa nzaa yalnaban kwaan tira lo re xaa nzhon xtizh xaa,
Nal za na kwent cheen gon kwaan le gu yudar re xaa mle nambey Jesús. Btop guya modxa nzhé na lo re xaa Jesús, xaa re yezh cheen Galacia.
Re ngwnaa nzhaal gon me xtizh sa me, modxa nii Xaa Nabeyy lo me.
Stub welt Jesús ngunii lo re myet nu nzhé xaa: —Lee na nak kwenta xni yizhyo; loka xaa kwaan reke tich na, nkano xaa xni kwaan nzaa yalnaban, nu nazet xaa naz lo yalnakaw.
Per re gu wech nu bzan, bselazh gu re wdizh kwaan nzhé re xaa mkayaa yalnabeyy lo Jesucrist, Xaa Nabeyy be.
nu nixa nankint xaa le myet yudar xaa, nel lee xaa nak xaa nle zee ban be nu ngob be mbi, nu nzaa xaa rese kwaan nkin be lo be.
Chelee be nle be krer kwaan nzaa myet yizhyo kwent lo be, seeka nzhaal le be krer kwaan nzaa Dios kwent lo be, nel naka kwaan mas wli. Nu Dios ngunii lo be cheen Xgann xaa.
Zo be gax lo Jesucrist zee gak be mod tub soldad xaa nkee yiib xuk, nu tira nalet be re kwaan nzhekla kwerp cheen be.
Nel mwii re xey be lo Dios, zee mluux bla cheen yezh Jericó, gorna ngulo mzaa re xaa welt cho yezh gazh mbizh.
Nu mzaa Dios zee mle Pab re kwaan gro doo lo re xaa.
Jesús nzhé: —Wlipa na nii na lo re gu, xaa nle jwalt nak mos cheen re kwaan nawent.
Rese gu xmig na, Dios nkedoola be nu seeka nzhaal kela be tub be stub be.
Mlu lu naz cheen yalnaban lo na, nu nyakdoola na nzo lu lo na. [Sal. 16:8-11]
Tubka lab xtizh Dios lo re xaa, zaa lu rason lo xaa, nu seed lu re xaa, nu zaa lu kwent cheen Jesucrist lo xaa axta zhin na.
Nu nixa nzhin yalzi lo be mod tub kwaan ntaaw yas, per nanakta tub kwaan lux be. Nu nixa nle doo be xgab per wen lextoo be.
Per lee stub naz xaa nxizhno xaa nu mbezh xaa: —¡Kan nel nzuzh xaa!
Nu lee ke kwaan nya bla nak ke kwaan le jaspe, nu lee yezh nak duzna or, kwaan nzhak kwenta bidr chul nzhak.
Nu leen yidoo cheen Dios mroo gazh mandad, xaa nzhano gazh yalzi. Nu re xaa ne nak ler rus kwaan nzhul na, nu kwaan nla xni lo, nu nzhi tub yed or laz xaa.
Naab be lo Dios kwent cheen re xaa nrenal be; nu nii be kwaan wen lo re xaa nge lo be.
Lee nii xaa nla xni mod tub lee yiib kwaan ngeey doo lo ki, nu lee bos cheen xaa nye doo mbezh kwenta tub pa nzhab nis.
Nu mlu na lo xaa cho nak lu, nu seetaka nlu naya, nu leeka mod nkela lu na, kela lu re xaa, nu snee noka na zo kwaan re xaa.
Chelee Dios namyent xaa Xgann xaa, sinka mzaa xaa xaa zee yet xaa kwent re xjwalt be, telisa zaa xaa lo re be kwaan Xgann xaa rese kwaan nkin be.
Nzhé re xaa: “Lee mbizh gwluzhtlaka lee re myet xizhno re kwaan wli, nu le xaa rese kwaan nzhekla xkwerp xaa”.
Per nayét gu mas xwara gu lo re ram yag kwaan mchoog xaa. Bzelazh gu nel naleet gu nle zee mban loxa, sinka loxa nle zee mban gu, zee nyent mod to gu yalxwa.
Nu nanzheklat nu nabeyy nu gu xomod nzhaal ngwii gu lo Dios, nel nye nzo gu lo Dios ngwii gu lo xaa, nebse nzhekla nu le nu yudar gu zee chul gak lextoo gu.
Ngu tub xaabyi ne nzak, xaa le Lach, xaa yezh Betania. Mari nu Mart, me nak leeka bzan Lach, nzho leeka yezh ba.
Kwaanzee loka xaa nanzaat yek gon re kwaan nguné nu, nalet lo myet nanzhont xaa diizh, sinka lo Dios, xaa mzaa Mbi Naban lo re be, nanzhont xaaya.
Snee labeyy gu cho nzho Mbi Naban cheen Dios lextoo: Rese xaa nii lee Jesús mbid yizhyo ne kwenta tub myet, xaa zee nzho Mbi Naban cheen Dios lextoo.
Nu sbaaka nkade re xaa nakap ne leeka lee xaa nu nle xaa kwaan nawent lo leeka kwerp cheen xaa, nanzhont xaa xtizh re xaa nabeyy xaa, nu nawent nii xaa lo re mbi mal kwaan nanlut.
Laa xaa lo kwaan nawent nu le xaa kwaan wen, kwaan xaa mod kwi wen xaa kwaan re xaa, nu reke xaa ticha.

chelee be tubka ngwii be lo Jesucrist, nu tubka nye zo be lo xaa, nu chelee be tubka kwaz be kayaa be re kwaan nzaa wdizh chul kwent. Kwaane nak kwaan nza na kwent, nu kwaan mbin gu nu kwaan mbin re xaa dubse yizhyo.
Zee lee re xaa mzen ke kee yenn xaa, per Jesús mkaxlaan nu mroo lach roo yidoo.
nu gak be tub xaa kub, nel Dios mdexkwaa be zee wlipa zo be nali nu nzhul lo xaa.
Nee luu, nen xomod nye nzo re xaa mle nambey Jesús lo Dios ded bid, xaa nzhon kwaan nabeyy Dios, xaa tubka ngwii lo Jesucrist.
¡Per Dios mseban xaa!
Lee na nak mod xaa chul nkanap re mbakxiil. Lee xaa chul nkanap re xmbakxiil, nzaa xaa yalnaban cheen xaa kwent cheen re mbakxiil.
Telisa nela gu lee Dios, lo yalnkela cheen xaa, mzaa xaa zhiin ne lo na.
Chelee tub xaa nle nzhak chop yek re xaa Jesús, gunii lo xaa tub welt o chop welt; per chelee xaa nanzaat xaa yek xaa gon xaa diizh, bloo xaa lo re xaa Jesús.
Gorna lee re xaa mbin kwaane mbare mrexcho xaa stub welt.
Per lee re xaa kwaan nle krer kwaan nii xaa noka mlu xaa wli nak Dios.
Kwaanzee, wech nu bzan, xaa nkedoola na, nel nkambaz be re kwaane, le be re kwaan wen, zee yizhal be lo Dios lee be chul nzhi, nu nali zo be, nu nik tub jwalt nanzhibt tich be.

Lee nal gwluzhtlaka, naab na lo re gu zee naab gu lo Dios kwent cheen nu, zee nzho mod zaa nu kwent cheen Xaa Nabeyy, nu zee mas lijer gon rese myet xtizh Dios, nu kayaa xaaya chul, mod mkayaa re guya.
Nel ne be Dios mseban Jesucrist, Xaa Nabeyy be lo yalgut, noka seban xaa re be kwaan lee xaa, zee wee xaa rese be zee zo be kwaan lee xaa.
Nu seeka chelee tub be gak ne, xaa zee nzhaal kwezh re xaa gol lo re xaa Jesucrist, zee teeb xaa anseyt cho xaa ne nzak, nu naab xaa lo Dios kwaan yalnabeyy cheen Xaa Nabeyy, zee sekwen Dios xaa.
’Choo liin nzho Ches leezha ngwa xaa lo re sawlazh be, xaa yilo, re dii cheen Israel.
Re xaa Israel mzen xaa ne, nu nal xaal na xaa lo lu nel nzhekla re xaa ngut xaa, per gorna ngune na lee xaa nak xaa Roma, zee ngwano na re soldad na nu mla na xaa lo re xaa.
Dubse yezh Éfeso ngwasya nu mzen xaa chop xaa, tub xaa le Gayo nu stub xaa le Aristarco, xaa yizhyo Macedonia, xaa mzhin kwaan Pab. Nu mbe xaa xaa pa nkasa re xaa yezh.
Lee gu ngunaab msela xaa tub xaa nzhut myet, nu sbaa mlaa gu Jesús, xaa nzhul nu nali nak.
Nel Dios mle kwaan wen lo be nu noka lo lee xaa; Dios mle nzhul lextoo be gorna mzelo be ngwii be lo xaa.
Kwaanzee kad tub xaa nzhaal le wen xaa xgab, gorna gaw xaa pan ne nu gorna go xaa xis ub ne.

Nu kwaanzee wech nu bzan, re gu xaa nkedoola na, tubka nali zo be lo Dios nu tubka nye zo be lo Dios, nu tubka kee be zhiin lo xchiin Xaa Nabeyy, nel ne re be lee zhiin kwaan kale be nanakta tub zhiin sbaasa.
Kwaanzee naab na lo gu ble gu mod nle na.

Nel kwaan yalnzhak cheen Dios, mle xaa zee lee re xaa yizhyo nanglabeyyt lee xaa, kwaan yalnzhak cheen leeka re xaa yizhyo. Nu nzhekla Dios zelazh yalnaban kwaan tira lo re xaa ngwii lo xaa, nixa lee wdizh ne, kwaan nzaa nu kwent, nlu lo re myet mod tub kwaan nachan.

Noka re gu ngwnaa me nkano sa, bin gu xtizh sa gu kwaan dub lextoo gu. Nu chelee xaa nanzhont xaa wdizh chul cheen Dios, zee ne xaa leeya nak kwaan chul, nebse wii xaa lo re kwaan nle gu, nu nankintra nii gu lo xaa.
Kwaanzee mkayaa nu yalnabeyy zaa nu kwent cheen Jesucrist; nu naab nu zee kwi chul rese myet kwaan lee xaa, kwent cheen Jesucrist.
Per Dios mseban xaa, namlaat Dios xaa lo re xaa ngut, nel nyent mod le yalgut gan lo xaa.
nu, ¿che naleet re xaa rik nak xaa naniiwent Jesucrist, mer xaa mzaa yalnaban lo be?
Nagakt xaa nguy, nixa nakwaant xaa dil, nzhaal gak xaa nadoo, nanzhaalt gak xaa tub xaa nzoblazh demi.
per loka xaa go nis kwaan za na, tira nagaknzhektra lextoo xaa. Nel lee nis kwaan za na go xaa, gak leen lextoo xaa mod tub xlen pa nlen nis, kwaan nzaa yalnaban kwaan tira.
Per chelee tub xaa gon xtizh Dios, zee lee yalnkela cheen Dios nzhero leen lextoo xaa. Sbaa ne be chelee be nzo be kwaan lee xaa.
Nu myun lo na, lee roo waz nu roo ma nakap nu roo ma nawlit ngunii Dios lo, mroo chon mbi mal, kwaan nzhak kwenta ran.
Wen nle be chelee be nle be kwaan nabeyy Xkyech Dios le be: “Kela lu sa myet lu modxa nkela lu lu”. [Lv. 19:18]
Nanzaat nu kwent cheen leeka nu, lee nu nzaa kwent cheen Jesucrist, Xaa Nabeyy be. Nebse nak nu xaa nkee zhiin lo re gu, kwent cheen Jesucrist.
Nalaat gu kade xaa gu. Modxa nzhé xaa: “Lee re xmig xaa nawent, nle zee nle xaa kwaan nawent”.

Naab na lo Dios, xaa nle zee chul kwi be, xaa mseban Jesucrist lo re xaa ngut, zee le xaa yudar be nu zaa xaa rese kwaan chul kwaan nkin be zee nzho mod le be kwaan nzhekla xaa. Nu nzhekla na gool rese myet lo Jesucrist tira nel lee xaa nak xaa wen nkanap re be, xaa nak mod re xmbakxiil xaa, nu mxo xaa xren xaa zee mlaa xaa wdizh kub lo re be. ¡Sbaa gaka!

Nebse kwaan nzhaal le re gu nak le gu re kwaan wen kwaan nxaal wdizh chul cheen Jesucrist, zee nii wen stub naz xaa lo Jesucrist. Nexa chol yal na lo re gu nu chol nayalt na lo re gu, per nzhekla na gon na lee re gu tubka lal nye nzo, nu tubka lal nle re gu xgab, zee nalet re xaa nangwiit lo wdizh chul cheen Jesucrist gan lo re gu.
Nu sbaa modxa mseban Dios Xaa Nabeyy be, sbaaka seban Dios be kwaan yalngezh cheen xaa.
Kwaanzee nii na lo lu, le xchiinra kwaan mzelazh Dios lo lu leezha mzhib na yaa na yek lu nu ngunaab na lo Dios kwent cheen lu.
Kwaanzee, noka lo re xaa ngut, mzaa xaa kwent cheen wdizh chul, zee nixa ngunaab Dios kwent lo xaa re kwaan mle xaa lo yizhyo ne, per nal ban mbi naban cheen xaa mod nzhekla Dios.
Kar doo mzi Dios be, kwaanzee nalaat be le stub xaa be mod tub mos stuba.
Nu nixa nanzhedizh went be Dios, nel kwaane mle lak re xaa zee, kwaanzee Dios mxaal xmandad xaa zee mbit xaa re xaa zee.
Nu nakalet re nu negos lo Kwent Chul cheen Dios, modxa nle zyen xaa; per nela Dios, kwaan dub lextoo nu nle nuya, nel Dios mxaal nu zaa nu kwent cheen Jesucrist.
Rese be, xaa nye nzo lo re xcheen Dios, nzhaal yela be ne be re xaa nanyet tant nzo lo re xcheen Dios; nu nakwaant be kwaan nyula leeka be.
Noka nle na xgab lee Xaa Nabeyy le yudar na zee naxchetra yal na lo re gu.
Gwluzh ngulo mded re kwaane, myun tap mandad cheen Dios lo na, xaa nzoli lo dap skin yizhyo, nu nsaaw xaa dap mbi cheen yizhyo, zee nanroot mbi lo yizhyo nixa leen nistoo nixa leen yag.

Lee re mbizh kwaan nle be re kwaan nle re xaa nanakt xaa Dios ngulola mded, kwaan nak mod: bis, yalnzoblazh lo re kwaan nawent, yalguy, nya yalni pa nle rese kwaan nzhekla kwerp cheen xaa, nzho doo nzoo, nu nzholl lo re maj, kwaan nak tub kwaan tira nawent.
Nu chelee tub xaa nzhekla seweey xaa xaa, lee rop xaa ne koo ki roo, zee zek xaa re xaa nayii ne xaa; nu snee yet loka xaa nzhekla seweey xaa.
Zee nzhé Pab: —Wech na, nanet na chelee xaa nak ngwleyy non doo; nel Xkyech Dios nzhé: “Naniiyet lu xaa nabeyy lazh lu”. [Ex. 22:28]
Per naz jwer lake re xaa nak kwenta mbak: re wezh, re xaa nchaal stub naz samyet, re xaa nzhut samyet, re xaa nzholl lo maj, nu rese xaa nkade.

Per kwaan nanyulat na nak: lo re gu nzho lak xaa nseed nzho mod gaw xaa baal kwaan nteed xaa lo mdo, nu nzho mod chaal stub naz re ngwnaa. Mer kwaane nak kwaan mlu Balaam lo rey Balac, leezha nzhekla xaa luu xaa xomod lux rey Balac re xey nu, xaa Israel.
Wech nu bzan, tubka nzhaal zaa nu dixkix lo Dios, kwaane nak kwaan wen, nel kad mbizh mas nzhaxenra gu lo mod ngwii gu lo Jesús, nu mas nkela gu tub gu stub gu.
Nzhaal ne gu leezha zer gak gu xaa Xaa Nabeyy, mbill gu lo re maj kwaan nambant.
Re xaabyi nzhaal kela xaa sa xaa, modxa mkela Jesucrist re xaa nak xaa xaa, nu mzaa xaa leeka lee xaa ngut kwent cheen re xaa xaa, zee chul yo re xaa xaa.
Nazaret be tub kwaan nawent lo re xaa kwaan nawent nle lo be. Le be kwaan nzak rese myet nak kwaan wen.
Gak be mod tub xaawin lo Dios, xaa ngezh doo, zee lee xaa le be tub xaa non, gorna nzhaal sbaa le xaa.

nixa namlaat xaa techo re myet sinka nlu xaa rese kwaan wen kwaan nle xaa lo re myet. Nlu xaa xomod nak xaa leezha nselazh yey lo be kwaan nxeen re yalgon cheen be, nu leezha nzaa xaa zyen kwaan gaw be zee chul nzhak lextoo be.

Nu sneeka nzhaal gak re ngwnaa: nzhaal le me kwaan nali zee nyent cho né lee me kale kwaan nawent, nakwaant me diizh, nu noka nzhaal wen nabeyy me lo kwerp cheen me, nu nzhaal gak me nali lo re kwaan nle me.
Mlaa na me zee chee me mod nak me, nu laa me re jwalt kwaan nle me, per nanet me laa me kwaan nchaal me stub naz xaabyi.

Herod nayii doo ngune re xaa rop yezh Tiro nu Sidón. Nu nel Tiro nu Sidón mkayaa xaa kwaan nzhaw xaa lazh Herod, mkwaan re xaa rop yezh ne nen xomod kwi wen xaa kwaan Herod. Mle xaa gan myenn xaa kwaan Blasto, tub xaa non nkee zhiin garli rey Herod, zee le xaa yudar xaa zee kwi wen xaa kwaan Herod.
Jesús mkeb nzhé: —Nankanot na nik tub mbi mal lextoo na. Lee kwaan nle na nak ngwii na respet lo Xuz na; per lee re gu nangwiit gu respet lo na.
Zee lee nis mzelo mgun nel nze doo mbi.
Nii na, lee yalzi kwaan kaded be nal nyent mod gak lal kwaan xni cheen Dios kwaan luu lo be.
Kakee na kwaane lo rese gu madwin, nel rese kwaan nawent kwaan mle gu mbyiibla kwent cheen kwaan mle Jesucrist.

Nel lee Dios mkiib re jwalt cheen be, zee mleey xaa be zee zo be nali lo xaa. Nu namlet xaaya nel mle be kwaan wen, mle xaaya nel nzhekla xaa, nu naka tub kwaan mlela xaa xgab axta yilo gorna zeeraka dexkwaa yizhyo, nu kwaanzee mxaal xaa Jesucrist lo be.

Gorna ngune re ngwleyy non nu re soldad, xaa nkanap yidoo lo xaa, mzelo re xaa nzhé: —¡Bkee xaa lo krus! ¡Bkee xaa lo krus! Zee nzhé Pilat lo re xaa: —Be gu xaa nu bkee gu xaa lo krus, per lee na nangaazht nik tub kwaan tich xaa.
Lee yilo, lee re xaa mzaa kwent kwaan nzhé Dios lo lee xaa nzhé, luu Dios yalnkela cheen xaa lo be nu koo Dios be lo yalgut cheen jwalt cheen be. Nu nzhekla re xaa ne, ne xomod le Dios re kwaane.
Zyen doo xaa nkade nzho yizhyo ne, nu re xaa ne nzhé: “Lee Jesucrist nambiidt kwenta tub myet wlipa lo yizhyo ne”. Nu nkade re xaa ne, nu nak xaa kontrad cheen Jesucrist.
Mzeen nu lee xaabyi ne kakiil re sawlazh nu, nu nzha xaa dubse yizhyo nle xaa re sawlazh nu chop tant; nu lee xaa nak tub xaa lo re xaa nreke tich Jesús, xaa yezh Nazaret.

¡Naro doo nak kwaan ngulaan, kwaan mlu Dios lo be, xaa ngwii lo Jesucrist! Zee snee mbezh be: Jesucrist myaad ngok xaa myet lo yizhyo, nu lee Mbi Naban cheen Dios mlu nali nak xaa, nu ngune re mandad cheen Dios lo xaa. Xaa dub lo yizhyo mbin kwent cheen xaa. Zyen doo myet lo yizhyo mwii lo xaa. Nu Dios mtexoob xaa naz yiba.
nu naz yiba ngob yuuke ndok, kwaan nga mod choobchii kil, nu lee re myet ngunii nawent nak Dios, kwent cheen yalzi cheen yuuke, nel mded doo xaa bid.
Per lee re be nkambaz yizhyo kub nu yiba kub kwaan né Dios zaa xaa, paro yo re be, xaa nali nak.
Lee yiba ta namlutra nu myuna mod tub lee yech kwaan nduuzh, nu rese yi nu rese yizhyo kwaan nzho leen nistoo mcheeya pa nzoba.
Nu ngok nali be lo Dios nel Jesucrist mle kwaan nzhekla Dios, gorna mzaa xaa kwerp cheen xaa mkee lo krus tubka welt.
Leezha nii nu lo Dios tubka nzaa nu dixkix lo xaa nel nye nzo gu lo xaa.
Nu mroo stub kabay naxne na, nu lee xaa nzob tich ma mkayaa yalnabeyy zee yo dil lo yizhyo, zee gut re xaa wechxinn xaa; nu mkayaa xaa tub espad kwaan ndok.
Rese xaa Jesús, xaa nak mos, nzhaal gon xaa xtizh xaa nabeyy xaa, zee naniit re myet lee Dios nawent nak, nu nii xaa nawent nak re kwaan nseed be re myet.
nu re yalnkade. Nel mlaa be mod ngok be yilo nu re kwaan nawent kwaan mle be yilo;

Per kwaan nanyulat na nak: nyela gu ne gu Jezabel, me kwaan mbezh nii kwent cheen na, per nebse nkade me re xmos na, nle me zee chaal xaa stub naz re ngwnaa, nu nle me zee nzhaw xaa baal kwaan mrib lo mdo.

Nu lo Xkyech Dios nzhéla lee Dios kayaa re xaa nanakt xaa Israel mod xaa nali lo xaa, re xaa kwaan ngwii lo Dios, nu nzhé xaa wdizh chul ne lo Abraham: “Kwent cheen lu, Dios le kwaan chul lo zyen doo xaa dubse yizhyo”. [Gn. 12:3]

¿Che myenlazhla gu kwent kwaan mzaa Dios lo gu, xaa nak mod xinn xaa? Nel lo Xkyech Dios nkee: Xiin na, nzhaal gak non lo lu mod nseli Xaa Nabeyy lu, nu nixa nagakt nales lextoo lu gorna lee xaa galno lu.

Gon be xtizh re xaa nseed be xtizh Dios, nu zheta gak be lo xaa, nel nanyizhat xaa kanap xaa be. Gon be xtizh xaa, zee tubka le xaaya kwaan yalnix nu nagakta tub kwaan nga doo nu sbaa mas chul seed be lo xaa.
Zee mlux xaa tub gazh yizhyo pa le Canaán, zee zaa xaa leyo cheen re xaa zee lo re xey be, xaa yilo.
Chelee tub xaa nlu stub naz kwaan nanakt lal kwaan re kwaan mlu Jesucrist, Xaa Nabeyy be, kwaan nle zee nye nzo be lo Dios,
Chelee tub xaa nchee xaa kwaan mlu Jesucrist lo be nu yiid xaa garli gu, nakwezht gu xaa garli gu, nixa nawdizhnot gu xaa.
Nel nded be bid mod mded Jesucrist bid, sbaaka nseleyy Dios be kwent cheen Jesucrist.

¡Ay, proob re xaa ba telisa lux xaa! Nel nzhake xaa tich re kwaan mle Caín. Nu mleey xaa kwaan nawent mod mle Balaam nel nzhekla xaa le xaa gan gro demi. Nu noka nak xaa mod Coré, xaa ngut nel nambint xaa diizh.
Per lee re xaa ne nawent nii xaa re kwaan nanet xaa xomod nak. Kwenta ma nak xaa, nu re kwaan nlabeyy xaa, nlabeyy xaaya mod nlabeyy re maya, per nanlat yek xaa lee xaa lux kwenta ma.

Nel mwii Noé lo Dios, leezha nzhé Dios lo xaa ded re kwaan zeeraka gak nu kwaan zeeraka lu, mbin xaa diizh nu mdexkwaa xaa tub bark, zee lee re sawlizh xaa ban. Nu sbaa mlu Noé lee re myet yizhyo nzhaal yet, nel namwiit xaa lo Dios; nu noka mle Noé gan zo nali xaa lo Dios, nel mwii xaa lo Dios.
Nu nii na, gorna list nzhi xaa re kwaane, lee re ngwleyy nrep yizata mbizh leen pa yilo leen yidoo, zee nle xaa xchiin xaa.

Noka nzhé Steb: —Nu lee re gu tubka nanzaat gu yek gu gon gu xtizh Dios, nixa nzob nzha gu gon gu per lee lextoo gu ned doo nak. Kwenta re xey be xaa yilo, nanzheklat gu gon gu xtizh Mbi Naban cheen Dios.

Nkin ne be kwaane, nik tub ley nangaazht tub kwaan tich re xaa nle kwaan wen, sinka lee ley naab kwent: lo re xaa nanlet kwaan nzhé ley, lo re xaa nanzhont diizh, lo re xaa nangwiit lo Dios, lo re xaa kwaan nle jwalt, lo re xaa nanont Dios lo, lo re xaa nanzhebt ne Dios, lo re xaa nzhut xuz nu nzhut xnaa, lo re xaa nzhut myet,
Lo stub yech cheen na mkee na lo gu, nanzhaalt zhaal gu kwaan re xaa kwaan nchaal stub naz sa myet.
Per Dios mleey na leezha zeeraka gal na, nu kwaan yalnkela cheen xaa mrezh xaa na. Nu leezha mzhib gan lextoo xaa,
Nanet na chozhiin nle na kwaan nawent, nu nanlet na re kwaan wen kwaan nzhekla na le na, leel re kwaan nawent kwaan nayii na ne na, mer kwaan zee nle na.
Per blabeyy wenra gu Jesucrist, Xaa Nabeyy be, xaa mzaa yalnaban kwaan tira lo be, nu bxeen gu yalnkela cheen xaa. ¡Lo lee xaa gool be nu nii be re wdizh chul, nala nu tubka! ¡Sbaa gaka! Pér

Nu nel nkela nu Jesucrist zee mbezh re xaa nachan nu, nu lee gu nzak nkela gu Jesucrist nu mbezh re xaa list gu. Gu nzak lee nu nak xaa nangezht nu lee gu nak xaa ngezh doo, nu nayii re myet ne nu, nu nkela re xaa gu.
Nalaat be le Maxuu gan lo be, tubka nali zo be wii be lo Dios, nel ne be dubse lo yizhyo lee re wech be kaded leeka bid kwaan kaded re be.

Rese xaa nak mos, nzhaal gon xaa xtizh xaa nabeyy lo xaa lo yizhyo ne. Nu tubka nzhaal kee xaa zhiin nu nakeet xaa zhiin nebse leezha kawii xaa nabeyy lo xaa, zee chul zo xaa kwaan lee xaa, nzhaal kee xaa zhiin kwaan dub lextoo xaa, nel nzheb xaa ne xaa Xaa Nabeyy, xaa nzho naz leen yiba.
’Lee re chii kach kwaan myun lo lu, nak chii rey, xaa zer nabeyy; per zhin mbizh nabeyy xaa kwaan ma nakap, per nabeyy xaa nebse tubka gor.
Nu namkayaat be mbi cheen yizhyo ne, lee be mkayaa Mbi Naban cheen Dios, zee labeyy be re kwaan mzelazh Dios lo be.
Bkenzha rese gu xaa rik. Binn gu nu brazhe gu nel lee re yalzi zhin lo gu.
Nazhebt gu mod ded gu bid nel lee Maxuu chep lak gu lozhyib zee le xaa preb gu; zee nkin ded gu bid chii mbizh. Bzo nali gu axta gorna yet gu zee za na koron cheen yalnaban kwaan tira lo gu.
Timoteo, lu nak xinn Dios. Kwaanzee bxonn lo re kwaane. Tubka blib lextoo lu: Le kwaan nali, nu nye bzo lo Dios, nu wii lo Jesucrist, bkela re myet, nu byelal, nu nadoo gok lo re xaa.
Lo yizhyo ne mkano gu rese kwaan nzhekla gu, nu mle gu re gust nzhak yek gu, nu msechaa gu gu, mod tub ma gut xaa gaw xaa.
Nu xkwes xaa myun lo na stub pa nzob galbtap xaa gol, xaa nabeyy. Xaa nak duzna ler rus nu nzob koron or yek xaa.
Nu leeka mod mle non me leeka lee me, nu ngu chul me, leeka mod ba bted gu me bid, bsegonn gu me, nel leen lextoo me nzhé me: “Lee na nak me nabeyy, nu nalaket techo na nixa nagonnt na”.

Sbaaka re be xaabyi, nkin zaa be yek be, zee ne be xomod nak xngwnaa be nu wii be respet lo me, zee nik tub kwaan nalet nakenzhat Dios xtizh be leezha naab be tub kwaan lo xaa. Sbaa nzhaal le be, nel ngwnaa nak me, nu mas naguun me ke be; nu mzaa Dios leeka yalnaban lo me kwaan mzaa xaa lo be.
Nu nii na nyent mod seed ngwnaa re xaabyi nu nixa nanabeyyt me lo re xaabyi, sinka nzhekla na naniit me leen pa nkasa gu nu nakeet me rezh.
Dios nak tub xaa nali nu nle xaa rese kwaan né xaa. Nu lee xaa nak xaa mrezh be zee yo be tubka kwaan Xgann xaa, xaa nak Jesucrist, Xaa Nabeyy be.
Wech nu bzan, Dios mleey re gu zee nawiitra gu lo ley. Nakint kozhaw gu ley, per nanzhaalt le gu rese kwaan nzhekla kwerp cheen gu. Nu nal wen kela gu nu ble gu yudar tub gu stub gu.
Le be kwaan wen nu nii be kwaan wen nel Dios naab kwent lo be mod nii xtizh xaa, kwaan nsela be lo re jwalt kwaan mle be.
Zyen doo mod nkee be xchiin Dios per lo tubka Xaa Nabeyy nkee be zhiin.

Lee re xey nu, xaa ngu yilo, nak xaa mzelo re dii cheen nu; nu noka Jesucrist ngok tub xaa dii cheen nu, leezha myaad xaa mod myet, nu nal lee xaa nabeyy lo rese kwaan. ¡Dixkix Dios, wen doo nak xaa! ¡Sbaa naka!
Kwaanzee chelee nu nded nu bid, nded nu bid zee lee re gu leyy, nu le gu gan yalnaban kwaan tira; nu cheleeya Dios nseleyy nu, naka zee noka lee re gu leyy, zee noka gu ye ded bid kwaan nded nu.
Nu Dios nak xaa nle zee nye nzo rese be lo Jesucrist, nu mleey xaa be zee tubka yo be kwaan Jesucrist,
Nu lee bos mbare ngunii stuba, nu nzhé lo xaa: —Rese kwaan mle nzhula na, naniit luya kwaan nanzhult.
Nu lee re rey yizhyo, xaa kwaan mchaal me nu ngu chul kwaan lee me, goon nu yo bel gorna ne xaa lo zhen kwaan karoo kayek me.
Jesús mkeb nzhé: —Xaa nkela na nzhon xaa xtizh na; nu nkela Xuz na xaa zee lee rop Xuz na yiid yo kwaan lee xaa.
Snee nak yalnkela: Nayét be lee be mkela Dios, per lee Dios mkela re be, nu mxaal xaa Xgann xaa gut, zee kix xaa re jwalt cheen re be.
Per chelee be nle be re kwaan nle re xaa nzo lo xni, modxa nzo Dios lo xni, nyenn tub be stub be, zee lee xren Jesucrist, Xgann xaa, le nambey re be lo rese jwalt kwaana mle be.
Nu kwaanzee nanaktra be tub mos, lee be nak xinn Dios, nu nel xinn Dios nak be, noka nzhekla xaa kayaa be re kwaan chul kwaan nguné xaa zaa xaa lo be.
Per gorna nzaa xaa kwent cheen Xgann xaa, nzhé xaa lo xaa: Lu nak Dios nu lee yalnabeyy cheen lu nak tira, nu naka tub yalnabeyy kwaan nali.
Lee re xaa mkeb nzhé: —Nazaaket nu lu lo re kwaan wen mle lu, zaake nu lu lo re kwaan nawent nii lu. Lu nak tub xaabyi, per lee lu kale mod Dios.
Nu tubka roo zhen cheen yalne cheen xaa. Nu nixa nakwazt yalne cheen xaa zhe nu yaal, re xaa kwaan nzholl lo ma nakap nu maj cheen ma, nu xaa nkano sey cheen ma.
Kwaanzee lee re nu tubka nye nzo nu, nel lee Dios, kwaan yalnles cheen xaa, mzaa xaa zhiin ne lo re nu.
Kwaanzee nzho mod yé be: Dios tubka nle yudar na nu nazhebt na ne na kwaan le myet na. [Sal. 56:3-4, 8-11; Sal. 118:6]

Kwaanzee lee re xaa kwaan nzhaw rese kwaan, nanzhaalt yé xaa, mas wenra xaa ke stub naz xaa nanzhawta. Nu lee re xaa kwaan nanzhawt rese kwaan, nanzhaalt yé xaa lee re xaa nzhaw rese kwaan nak xaa nawent, nel Dios mkayaala tub naz xaa stub naz xaa.
Nzhekla na lee Dios, xaa nyedoola nu xaa nseleyy be, le yudar gu zee chul kwi gu kwaan re wechxinn gu, modxa mlu Jesucrist,

Nanakt xaa mod stub naz re ngwleyy, xaa nkin gut tub ma yizata mbizh nu teed xaa ma kwent cheen re jwalt cheen leeka lee xaa, zeera teed xaa ma kwent cheen re jwalt cheen re xaa yezh, per lee Jesús mle kwaane tubka welt, gorna mzaa xaa leeka lee xaa yet.
Chelee tub be nzho kwaan lo, nu ne be lee tub xinn Dios nzho nisda doo, nu nanlest lextoo be ne be xaa, nu nanzaat be tub kwaan lo xaa, ¿xomod nkano be yalnkela cheen Dios leen lextoo be?
Kwaanzee nzhaal yakla be, nel ne be, leezha laa be kwerp ne zee nya be lo Xaa Nabeyy be.
Re gu, xaa nkela na, naab na lo gu, nalaat gu lee re kwaan nzoblazh kwerp cheen gu le gan lo gu, leeka kwaan ndil kwaan yalnaban cheen gu, nel nanakt be xaa yizhyo ne.
Wii be respet lo re myet, nu kela be re wech be nu re bzan be, nu zheb be ne be Dios, nu gon be xtizh xaa nabeyy yezh.
Nu Ches mle xgab lee re sawlazh be, zeen lee Dios mxaal lee xaa koo xaa re xaa yizhyo Egipto; per lee sawlazh be namzeenta.

Bkanap gu gu lo re xaa nak kwenta tub mbak ma nakap doo, nel mbezh re xaa nzhaal choog re xaa tik yed cho xaa zee yo xaa beyy cheen re nu, xaa Israel, zee nzho mod le xaa gan yalnaban kwaan tira. Bkanap gu gu lo re xaa snee nle, nel nawent nak kwaan kale xaa.
Mbezh xaa nlabeyy xaa Dios, per re kwaan nle xaa nlu nawlita. Lee xaa nak tira nawent, tub xaa ned, nu nanlet kwaan wen.
Nroo na jabor cheen re xaa nel ne na lee re xaa nkela re xcheen Dios, per nanlabeyyt xaa mer kwaan wli.
Nu nseleyy Dios be gorna kaded be bid, zee noka re be seleyy re xaa kaded bid; nu seleyy be xaa kwentaxa mseleyy Dios be.
Tubka bkee zhiin axta paro nzho moda lo lu, zee zo wen lu lo Dios; nel wen nkee lu xchiin xaa, zee natont lu. Nali bzaa kwent cheen re wdizh wli cheen Xaa Nabeyy.
Xaa ne gak xkontrad rese dios kwaan nzholl myet lo, nu xaa ne gak gaya lo rese dios cheen myet. Nu axta ya xaa nu zob xaa leen yidoo cheen Dios nu yé xaa lee xaa nak Dios.
Nu lee re xaa nak xuz mad nanzhaalt chal xyan xaa mad, sinka nzhaal seed xaa mad gak mad tub mad wen, nu nzhaal seed xaa mad mod nzhekla Xaa Nabeyy.
Per naluxt be lo rese kwaane. Telisa le be gan nel nkela Jesucrist be.

Zee rese nu mla lo yo, nu na mbin tub bos kwaan ngunii lo na wdizh hebreo: “Saulo, Saulo, ¿chozhiin nrenal lu na? Leeka lu kaseweey lu, mod tub ma kwaan nkee patad yek yag kwaan ngin xaa ma. See nak lu.”

‘Ne na xomod nded gu bid, nu yalprob cheen gu, per lee gu nak xaa rik naz leen yiba. Nu ne na xomod nzhedizh nawent re xaa gu, re xaa kwaan mbezh nak xaa dii cheen Israel, per kwaan wlipa nak xaa xaa Maxuu.
xaa nkela nanyulat ded stub xaa bid, nu nix doo nzhak lextoo xaa ne xaa re kwaan wli.
Kwaanzee nii na lo gu: Laa be rese kwaan nanzhult nu laa be rese kwaan nawent. Gak be tub xaa nadoo, laa be nabeyy xtizh Dios lextoo be zee koo Dios be lo yalgut.
Nal za na kwent xomod naka; leezha mza na kwent xtizh Dios lo gu, naka mod mlo na bizh lo yo; nu leezha mseed Apolos gu, naka mod mzoog xaaya, per Dios nak xaa nle zee mxena.
Zeera nzhake stub mandad, nu nzhé xaa: —¡Mlux Babilonia, yezh ndok, nel Babilonia mle zee le rese myet rese yezh kwaan tira nawent nak, nu nak mod msezuzh Babilonia xaa rese yezh!
Re gu nak xmig na, chelee gu nle gu re kwaan mnabeey na gu le gu.
Rese gu, xaa mod xiin na, nawiit gu lo rese maj. Sbaa gaka. Juan
Nel lo re xaa ne nzho xaa nya tub yoo nu stub yoo nu nkade xaa re ngwnaa, me tira nanagant kade xaa. Re me ne tubka nle xgab le me zyenra kwaan nawent, nu le me rese kwaan nzhekla xkwerp me.
Per nzhaal nii be re kwaan wli kwaan yalnkela, nu nzhaal nyera zo be lo Jesucrist, xaa nak xaa nabeyy lo rese be.
nu tubka blaa gu nabeyy Mbi Naban lextoo rese gu, zee chul kwi gu.
Lee Saulo mnabdizh: —¿Cho lu, Xaa Nabeyy? Nu lee xaa mkeb nzhé: —Lee na nak Jesús, xaa nrenal lu.
Mas wen wii be lo Jesucrist, zee nabeyy xaa lextoo be; nu tubka list zo be keb be lo xaa nabdizh lo be chozhiin ngwii be lo Dios.
Zee lee Xaa Nabeyy nzhé lo xaa: “La yelyed nii lu, nel lee pa nzo lu nak leyo nzhul.
Blochaw gu re kwaan mbin gu yilo lextoo gu, zee tubka zo gu kwaan Xuz be nu Xgann xaa, chelee kwaan mbin gu yilo nzho lextoo gu.
Wlipa na nii na, loka xaa kwaan nzhon kwaan nii na, nayeta xaa.
Zee myun Dios lo na, xaa nzob naz pa nabeyy xaa. Nu lo xaa nzhekla yizhyo nu yiba xonn, per nik tub pa nanguzhalt yoya.

Mbezh re xaa: “Lee kwaan gaw na, gaw naya nel naaba lextoo na”. Wliya, per ropse kwaane lux Dios. Kwaanzee lee kwerp cheen be namzaat Dios lo be zee leya re kwaan nawent, mzaa xaaya lo be zee gaka cheen Xaa Nabeyy nu lee Xaa Nabeyy nkanapa.
Nu seeka, noka nzhaal gak be mod tub xaa ngut lo re jwalt, per noka gak be mod tub xaa mban lo Dios kwent cheen Jesucrist.

¡Dixkix Dios, xaa tubka nle zee nyent mod le stub xaa gan lo nu, kwent cheen kwaan mle Jesucrist! Nu kwent cheen nu nle Dios nrech kwent cheen Jesucrist zee labeyy re xaa xaa, kwaan nzharech zyen doo yezh mod tub bech;
Nu kwaane nak kwaan né Jesucrist lo re nu, nu snee nseed nu re gu: Dios nak xni, nu tira nyent yalnakaw lo xaa.
Rese xaa nzaa Xuz na lo na, nyiid lo na, nu lee xaa kwaan nyiid lo na nachexonnt na xaa naz jwer.
Nalaat be kela be tub be stub be mod wech be.
Kwaanzee nzho mod tira koo xaa re xaa lo yalgut, re xaa mbii gax lo Dios kwent cheen xaa, nel tira mban xaa nu nzho mod nii xaa lo Dios kwent cheen re xaa.

Per lee re xaa nzhé: —¡Yet xaa! ¡Yet xaa! ¡Bkee xaa lo krus! Lee Pilat mnabdizh lo re xaa: —¿Che nzhekla gu kee na xrey gu lo krus? Nu lee ngwleyy non doo mkeb nzhé: —¡Nankanot nu stub rey, nebse César, xaa nabeyy dub pa nabeyy Roma!
Nu sbaaka nal nzho zlak sawlazh na nak xaa Dios, xaa mleey Dios kwaan yalnkela cheen Dios.
Lee re rey, xaa nabeyy yizhyo mchaal kwaan lee me, nu re kwaan nawent kwaan nle me nak kwenta xis ub kwaan nzho re xaa yizhyo zee nzuzh xaa.
Kela be tub be stub be mod nkela be re wech be nu re bzan be, nu le be xgab xwara stub be ke leeka be.
Nel rese xaa nle kwaan nzhekla Mbi Naban cheen Dios nak xaa xinn Dios.
Zee myun stub kwaan nabix lo na yiba, tub waz doo, ma naxne na, nu nzob gazh yek nu tubga koron kad tub yek ma, nu nzob ma chii xkach ma.
Nu nel nak be xinn xaa noka be kayaa re xcheen xaa, re kwaan mkayaa Xgann xaa Jesucrist, chelee be wlipa no be ded be re yalzi mod mded xaaya, zee gwluzh kano be leeka xni kwaan nkano xaa.
Lee re xaa gol, xaa wen nabeyy lo re xaa Jesús, nzhaal wii re xaa Jesús respet lo xaa, nu masra nzhaal wii re xaa respet lo xaa, chelee xaa nzaaka xaa kwent xtizh Dios.
Per naret xaa ne kwaane. Lak gu mbill lo re maj yilo nu leezha nzhaw gu re ma mteed xaa lo maj, nzak gu nzhaw gu tub kwaan nak cheen tub dios. Nel lee xgab cheen gu nangezht, zee nzhak chop yek gu.
Chelee tub re ram, nanzaat xle, tira choog xaaya. Per chelee tub ram nzaa xle, nle nzhul xaaya zee zaaya mas zyen xle.
Nalet beya mod tub xaa nabeyy, xaa nakap nak, le beya tub mod nzho mod wii re xaa lo be, zee le xaa mod nle be.
Nu nal wech nu bzan, nzhekla nu ne gu cho kwaan gak kwaan re xaa Jesús, xaa ngutla, zee nagakt nalest lextoo gu modxa nales doo nzhak lextoo re xaa nakwazt kayaa nik tub kwaan gorna yet xaa.
Nel mwii re xey be lo Dios, zee mded xaa Nistoo Naxne lo yo bizh; nu gorna lee re xaa Egipto nzhekla ngded, rese xaa ngwep nis.
Re mbizh zee ngol Ches, tub mad nix nzhak lextoo Dios ne. Nu xuz mad nu xnaa mad mxeen mad li xaa chon mbee.
Nel noka ngwleyy nle jwalt, zee nlesla xaa ne xaa re xaa nanet xana kwaan wen, re xaa kwaan nzha naz nawent;

Nel nal merla mded yaal nu merla nguni yizhyo; kwaanzee nkin naletra be re kwaan mle be leezha mzo be lo yalnakaw; nkin gak be xab be, kwaan nak cheen Dios kwaan nla xni cho, mod tub soldad, xaa list nzo.
Nu rese xaa nabeyy nanzhaalt yii xaa lo xmos xaa, nel lee Xaa Nabeyy nzho naz yiba nu nabeyy lo ropse xaa; nu lal non ropse lo Xaa Nabeyy.
Le be chul gak lextoo be lo re xaa kwaan chul nzhak lextoo, nu gonn be kwaan re xaa kayonn.
Per nel ned be zee nanet be wii be lo Dios, zee kazhibra be zyenra yalnayii cheen Dios tich be, axta zhin mbizh kwaan naab Dios kwent lo rese myet tub mod nali,
Gorna mzhin lak xaa Israel, xaa Antioquía nu xaa Iconio, mle xaa gan mchee xaa xgab cheen re myet; zee mzaake xaa Pab nu mle xaa xgab mbit xaa Pab, zee mdobxex xaa xaa mloo xaa xaa naz jwer roo yezh.
Gorna ngulo nzhé Jesús kwaane, tira nawent ngok lextoo xaa, zee nzhé xaa: —Wlipa na nii na, lee tub gu zaa na lo re xaa gut na.
Per kwaan nzhé Xkyech Dios nak rese xaa nak mod xaa nzho lozhyib kwent cheen jwalt. Zee lee re xaa kwaan ngwii lo Jesucrist kayaa kwaan nzhé Dios zaa Dios.
Per gorna ngulo mzaa xaa kwent, lee tub ma nakap roo leen yerdoo nu dil kwaan rop xaa ne, nu zle ma gan lo rop xaa ne nu gut ma xaa ne.
Nel tubka nak be kwaan Jesucrist, chelee be tubka ngwii be lo xaa, modxa mzelo be nu sbaaka gak be axta mbizh gwluzhtlaka.

Per chelee Jesucrist nzo lextoo be zee lee Dios ngwii lo be mod tub xaa nali, nu nixa ngut kwerp cheen be kwent cheen re jwalt kwaan mle be, per lee mbi naban cheen be mban kwent cheen Mbi Naban cheen Dios.
Lee re xey be mrenal re xaa mzaa kwent kwaan nzhé Dios lo lee xaa, xaa mzaa kwent yaad Xaa Nali nak. Nu mbit xey be re xaa ne. Nu gorna myaad Xaa Nali nak, re gu mzen xaa nu mbit re gu xaa.

nzoblazh xaa, nzuzh xaa, nya xaa yalni pa nle xaa rese kwaan nzhekla kwerp cheen xaa, nu stub naz kwaan nawent kwenta re kwaane. Nu bare na nii na lo gu, kwentaxa nguniila naya lo gu yilo, lee re xaa kwaan tubka nle re kwaane, nayizot xaa Pa Nabeyy Dios.
Bwii gu lo xni nal, nel nzokaya lo gu, zee gak gu xinn xaa nak xni. Gorna ngulo nzhé Jesús re kwaane, nya xaa nu mkaxlaan xaa lo re myet.
Lee xaa ngok tub xaa nali lo Dios, mod ngok Ches, dubse leezha mkee xaa zhiin lo re xaa Dios.
nel tira mzaa xaa Mbi Naban cheen xaa lo be, kwent cheen kwaan mle Jesucrist, xaa mzaa yalnaban lo be,
Nu lo re xaa ngu tub xaa le Che, xaa nak dii Leví. Xaa ne nak xaa yizhyo Chipre. Lee re xaa mkayaa yalnabeyy lo Jesús mlole xaa Bernabé. (Wdizh ne nii: “Xaa Nseleyy”.)
Kwaanzee nanzhaalt yizha be le be kwaan wen, nel chelee be nayachet lextoo be, zee top be yalgon mer tyemp nak cheena.
Nel lee lo ley nu lo kwent cheen ley, mod tub xaa ngut nak na, zee ban na mod nzhekla Dios.
Zee mzaa xaa tub lee nit lo na, kwaan nzhak kwenta tub metr kwaan nchiix xaa, nu né xaa lo na: —Gwa nu bchiix yidoo cheen Dios nu mdo cheena, nu blab lak xaa nzholl lo Dios baa.

Re xaa ne nali nak lo Dios nu namchaalt xaa nik tub ngwnaa. Re xaa ne nzhake tich Mbakxiil naz kwaana nzha ma. Dios nu Mbakxiil mzi re xaa ne lo yizhyo, zee gak xaa mod tub gon kwaan yilotlaka lo Dios.
Lee re mbeso nzhak mod kabay ma nya lo dil; nu yek ma nzob tub kwaan nzhak kwenta tub koron or, nu lee garlo ma nzhak kwenta garlo myet.
Le be mod tub xaa libr, per nalet be kwaan nawent nel nak be tub xaa mla. Mas wen kweey be le be mod tub xmos Dios.
Kwaan be nu le be jwers zee nye zo be lo Dios, nel nkambaz be Dios, xaa tubka mban. Lee xaa mzaa yalnaban lo re be, nel ngwii be lo Jesucrist, nu nzhekla xaa zaa xaaya lo rese myet yizhyo.
Nu nel sbaa mle xaa, ¡telisa grora bid ded re xaa kwaan ngoo xkyalnto Xgann Dios, nu nanont xren xaa lo xaa kwaan mle nzhul xaa lo Dios, nu mde xaa lo Mbi Naban cheen Dios, xaa nkela xaa!
Zee lee Jesús né lo re nu stub welt: —¡Chul kwi re gu! Modxa mxaal Xuz na na, sbaaka xaal na re gu.
Rese xaa ne nii nawent nak rese kwaan, nu nebse nreke xaa tich re kwaan nzhekla xkwerp xaa, nto xaa yalxwa, nu nii xaa nadoo zee le xaa gan tub kwaan lo stub xaa.

Nu lee re rey mkaxlaan leen re yeer nu leen kelag. Nu re xaa nabeyy lo re soldad mkaxlaan kwaan lee xaa, nu noka re xaa rik mkaxlaan kwaan lee xaa, nu noka re xaa nabeyy nu re xmos xaa, nu re xaa sbaasa mkaxlaan kwaan lee xaa.

Per lee re xaa kwaan nzheb, re xaa nanet wii lo Dios, re xaa naxinn nak, re xaa kwaan nzhut myet, re xaa kwaan nchaal stub naz sa myet, xaa nle yalwezh, xaa nzholl lo maj, nu rese xaa nkade. Rese xaa ne nya leen yal kwaan kayek kwaan azufre, nu kwaane nak yalgut mrop.
Nal nakwaztra lu. Guxso, nu brubnis, nu gunaab lo Xaa Nabeyy zee chee xaa rese kwaan nawent kwaan mle lu.”
Lee yich yek ma nzhak kwenta yich yek ngwnaa, nu lee leyy ma nzhak kwenta leyy mbezh.
Nu lee tub xaa nak xmos Xaa Nabeyy nanzhaalt kwaan xaa diizh, mas wen gak xaa tub xaa nadoo lo rese myet, nu nzhaal gak xaa tub xaa nzho mod seed stub naz myet, nkin yedoola xaa ne xaa re myet.
Nu nixa nanzot na kwaan kwerp cheen na lo gu, nzo xgab cheen na lo re gu, nu nyakla na ne na lee re gu chul nzho gu nu nali ngwii gu lo Jesucrist.
Nel lee Xaa Nabeyy nkanap re xaa nali nak, nu nkenzha xaa re kwaan nii xaa, per nayii xaa ne xaa re xaa nle kwaan nawent. [Sal. 34:12-16]

Wech nu bzan, lee re nu tubka nzaa dixkix lo Dios kwent cheen gu, nel tant nkedoola Xaa Nabeyy gu. Nu axta yilo mleey xaa gu zee le gu gan yalnaban kwaan tira, nel lee Mbi Naban nkee zhiin leen lextoo gu, nu mle nambey xaa gu, nel tubka nreke gu tich re kwaan wli.

Lee re xaa nle kwaan nawent, kwaan nawent lera xaaya, nu lee re xaa nkano xgab beed, xgab beed kanora xaa; per lee xaa nle kwaan nali kwaan nali lera xaa, nu lee xaa nambey nak seetaka nambey gak xaa.

Zee nzhé Pér lo re xaa: —Laa gu nalet gu kwaan nawent, nu wii gu lo Jesucrist, nu brubnis kad tub gu kwaan yalnabeyy cheen Jesucrist, zee chee xaa re jwalt kwaan nawent kwaan mle gu, nu zaa Dios Mbi Naban lo gu.
Nazaat gu diizh le tub xaa leeka kwaan nawent kwaan mle sa myet xaa lo xaa, sinka tubka nzhaal le gu kwaan wen lo tub gu stub gu, nu lo rese myet yizhyo.

Nu leeka snee lee re xaabyi, nchaal xaa leeka sa byi xaa. Kwaanzee nlaa xaa xngwnaa xaa nu nle xaa rese kwaan nzhekla xkwerp xaa, nu nchaal xaa leeka sa byi xaa, tub kwaan tira nawent. Nu kwaane nle zee nded doo xaa bid lo re kwaan nawent kwaan nle xaa.
Nu byakdoola re gu, nu nix doo gok lextoo re gu tubka kwaan na.
Blaa gu naletra gu kwaan nawent nu wii gu lo Jesús, nu chee gu mod nak gu, zee chee Dios rese kwaan nawent kwaan mle gu, zee seleyy Dios gu.
Nu lee pwert cheena nayaawt nik tub mbizh nu lee loya nayot yaal.
Loka xaa kwaan gaw baal cheen na nu go ren cheen na nkano xaa yalnaban kwaan tira, nu na seban xaa mbizh gwluzh.
Zee lee Jesús mkeb nzhé: —Nyent mod nabeyy lu lo na, chelee Dios namzaat yalnabeyy lo lu; per lee xaa kwaan mzaa na lo lu, mas nkano kulp ke lu.
Kwaanzee chelee be mbezh be ngwii be lo Jesucrist, per nanlet be kwaan nzhekla Dios, nawlit kwaan nii be nu nankanot be yalnaban kwaan tira.

Nel Dios mle rese kwaan nyent mod ngle ley kwaan mzaa Dios lo Ches, nel rese myet tubka nayet xaa le kwaan nzhé ley. Kwaanzee mxaal Dios Xgann xaa mod tub myet, xaa nzeb jwalt, zee yet xaa xkwent be nu sbaa mlux xaa yalnabeyy cheen jwalt.
Per chelee be ded be bid nel nle be kwaan wen, le Dios kwaan chul lo be. Nu nalet be xgab leezha nayii re myet ne be, nixa nazhebt be ne be re myet.
Nu lee re xaa nak xuz mad nanzhaalt le xaa rixyan mad, zee nagakt nalest lextoo mad.

Nu dublegan nii xaa, mbezh xaa nu nzhé xaa: —¡Mlux Babilonia, yezh ndok! ¡Ngoka tub pa nzho re mbi mal, nu ngoka tub pa nkaxlaan re mbi mal, nu ngoka xlaaz rese mbyin, ma nyent mod gaw xaa nu re mbyin naxinn!
¿Cho nak xaa nkade? Xaa nkade nak xaa yé lee Jesús nanakt Crist, Xaa Mxaal Dios Nabeyy. Nu xaa zee nak kontrad cheen Jesucrist, nu nii xaa Dios nanakt xuz Jesús nu Jesús nanakt Xgann Dios.
Nu nii na, loka xaa gaw pan ne o go xis ub ne sbaasa, tira nawent kwaan nle xaa leezha nselazh be xkwerp Xaa Nabeyy nu xren xaa.
¡Bxen! Nzhaal zeen lu, chelee tub xaa mbezh ngwii lo Jesucrist nu nik tub kwaan nzhekla Dios nanlet xaa, nanont mbezh xaa sbaa.
Zee lee Judas mzhin baa kwaan tub partid soldad, nu kwaan lak polisi, xaa nkanap yidoo, xaa kwaan mxaal re ngwleyy non, nu re fariseo. Re xaa ne nzeno yiib, nu nzeno xaa xbruj xaa nu yerbal.
Per nali doo nak xgab Xaa Nabeyy, nu lee xaa nle zee nye nzo gu nu nkanap xaa gu lo kwaan nzhekla Maxuu le lo gu.
Gorna mlaa xaa mad, lee xchap faraón nguzhal mad nu mxeen me mad kwenta mod xinn me.
Zee lee mandad mzen yann or cheen yaal, nu mchazhe xaaya kwaan ki kwaan nzhib lo mdo, nu mlebi xaaya naz lo yizhyo. Zeera mroo ngwzi nu nye doo ngoch ngwzi, nu nye doo mgun xog.
Nel rese yezh yizhyo mzuzh kwaan re kwaan nawent kwaan mle me nu rese rey yizhyo mchaal me, nu lee re xaa nto dubse yizhyo nzheyak rik lo re kwaan mzoblazh me mzi me.
Nu kwaane mle na zee lee lak xaa sawlazh na mzen na lach roo yidoo nu nzhekla xaa ngut xaa na.
zee laa xaa wii xaa lo re kwaan wli, nu gon xaa re kwent gox.
Per seesa nzho lak gu nanet wii lo na. Nel axta yilo, nela Jesús cho xaa nanet wii lo xaa, nu ne xaa xana xaa zaa xaa lo re xaa nzhekla gut xaa.
Jesús mkeb nzhé: —Lebsii na tik pan, nu loka xaa za naya gaw, xaa zeeya. Gorzee mlebsii xaa tik pan nu mzaa xaaya lo Judas Iscariote, xgann Simón.
Wech Timoteo. Wen ble re kwaan mkayaa lu le lu. Nankenzhat lu re kwent yizhyo ne, nixa nankenzhat lu xtizh re xaa nle mod tub xaa nzhak doo, nel nik tik nagakt xaa re kwaan nii xaa.

Per kwaane mle ngwasya re xaa Israel, nu mtop xaa lak xaabyi, xaa nakap doo nzo lo xbi, nu nle xaa zee rese xaa yezh yii. Zee ngwa xaa garli Jasón, mle xaa xgab zee yizhal Pab rop Silas zee zaa xaa xaa lo re xaa yezh.

Chelee tub be ne be lo re xaa Jesús, lee tub wech be o tub bzan be o tub bal be, kale tub jwalt kwaan nanyanot xaa lo yalgut, naab be lo Dios kwent cheen xaa, zee lee Dios zaa yalnaban cheen xaa, chelee xaa nanlet xaa tub jwalt kwaan nanakt kwaan yet xaa. Per nzho jwalt kwaan nzhe xaa lo yalgut, nu naniit na nzhaal naab be lo Dios yiib jwalt cheen xaa zee.
Wlipa na nii na, loka xaa wii lo xaa mxaal na, noka ngwii xaa lo na, nu xaa ngwii lo na, noka ngwii xaa lo xaa mxaal na.
Kwaanzee rese be nzhaal nyakla be nel kakayaa be tub pa chul kwaan kazaa Dios lo be, tub pa nangunt. Kwaanzee nzhaal gool be lo Dios mod nyula xaa, nu gon be xtizh xaa kwaan yalnacheb,

Ngu lak xaa Israel, xaa nya tich tub yezh stub yezh, nzhekla xaa koo xaa mbi mal lextoo re myet. Nu nle xchiin xaa yalnabeyy cheen Jesús lo re xaa nzho mbi mal lextoo nu mbezh xaa lo re mbi mal: —Kwaan yalnabeyy cheen Jesús, xaa nzaa Pab kwent, nabeey na lu, broo.
Nu lee Pab kwent cheen xaa mleey xaa Silas. Nu re xaa Jesús ngunaab lo Xaa Nabeyy zee kanap xaa xaa. Zee mroo rop xaa baa,
Kwaanzee kanap gu gu zee naluxt gu xchiin gu kwaan mle gu gan, sinka kayaa gu kwaan zaa Dios lo gu.

Rop xaa ne nzho mod saaw yiba zee nalatra yey dubse mbizh kwaan zaa xaa kwent kwaan yé Dios lo xaa; nu noka nzho mod le xaa gak nis ren nu chezi xaa re myet yizhyo kwaan rese yalzi, gorna nzhekla xaa.
Nyent mod kee lu xchiin Dios, nel lee lextoo lu nanakt nali lo Dios.
Rese xaa nak xaa na noka nak xaa xaa lu, nu re xaa nak xaa lu noka nak xaa xaa na. Lu mle zee ngwii re myet respet lo na kwent cheen re xaa ne.
Rese xaa mlaa Dios, rese xaa mzen naz nawent, lal ngok rese xaa zee nyentra sirb re xaa. ¡Nik tub xaa nle kwaan wen nyent! ¡Nik gola tub xaa! [Sal. 14:1-3]
Nik tub welt nalet be xgab nebse re be, nu nixa natot be yalxwa zee nii chul re xaa lo be, sinka le wen be lextoo be nu le be xgab xwara re myet ke be.
nu xsaww lo gazh bruj ne nzo tub xaa nzhak kwenta myet, nu lee xab xaa kwaan nak xaa nzhin axta nii xaa nu nzhi tub yed or laz xaa.
Nu baa nayotra nik tub kwaan nawent; nu lee pa nabeyy Dios nu Mbakxiil cheen Dios zob leen yezh, nu lee re xmos xaa gool lo xaa;
Mzhin gaxla mbizh kwaan lux yizhyo; kwaanzee, tubka list zo be nu gak be tub xaa nzhano yek, zee nzho mod wdizhno be Dios.
pa mzen xaa bark mzhin xaa Antioquía, yezh cheen Siria. Leen yezh ne mxaal xaa xaa mzaa xaa kwent cheen Xaa Nabeyy, lo yalnkela cheen Dios. Nu sbaa mle xaaya.
Per chelee be chelya be tub ngwnaa, nanlet be tub kwaan nawent, nu chelee tub ngwnaa chelya noka nanlet me kwaan nawent. Per xaa nkano sa ropse xaa ded bid, kwaan nzhekla na nak nadedt be bid.
Nu nakadilt be kwaan tub myet, lee be kadil kwaan yalngezh cheen re mbi mal kwaan nzho naz ya, nu kwaan re mbi mal kwaan nabeyy lo yizhyo ne, kwaan nzho lo yalnakaw nu nle re kwaan nawent.
Nu cheleeya cho be nzho jwalt yalnzhak lo, gunaab beya lo Dios, nel telisa zaa xaaya lo be nu nagalnot xaa be nel ngunaab beya lo xaa.
Nu nasaawt be lo kwaan nzhekla Mbi Naban le.
Nu lee yidoo ne nak chop leen; lee leena pa yilotlaka le Pa Nambey, pa nzo bruj kwaan nzaa xni, nu mdo pa nzob pan nayon cheen Dios.
Kwaanzee nii na lo gu: Bzi gu or kwaan wlipa lo na, zee wlipa gak gu xaa rik; nu bzi gu ler rus lo na zee natontra gu nel cheey gu; nu bzi gu tub remed lo na yo garlo gu zee yani garlo gu.
Kakee na kwaane lo re gu, xaa ngwii lo Xgann Dios, zee ne gu lee gu nkano yalnaban kwaan tira nanluxt.
Lee xaa kwaan nii kwent cheen leeka lee xaa, nle xaaya zee lee re myet wii lo xaa; per lee xaa nleya zee wii re xaa lo xaa kwaan mxaal xaa, xaa ba mbezh kwaan wli nu nankadet xaa ba.
Nu lee xni ne nzho leen lextoo be. Per mod tub yas yo nak be, zee luu lee yalngezh ne nak cheen Dios nu nanakta cheen be.

Rese be wech nu bzan, nazeret be re kwaan nawent mle stub naz xaa lo be, nzhaal laa be naab Dios xkwent xaa. Modxa nzhé Dios lo Xkyech Dios: “Lee na nzhaal naab kwent; nu na zereya, né Xaa Nabeyy”. [Dt. 32:35]
Jesús mkeb nzhé: —Cheleeya leeka na le zee wii xaa respet lo na, nanonta. Per lee xaa kwaan nle zee wii xaa respet lo na nak Xuz na, leeka xaa kwaan mbezh re gu nak Xdios gu.
Nanzhaalt lux be xchiin Dios lextoo stub be, nebse kwent cheen kwaan nzhaw be. Rese kwaan nzhaw xaa nak wen, lee kwaan nawent nak gaw be tub kwaan le zee ralnii stub wech be.
Nu snee Nikodem rop Che mbe kwerp cheen Jesús nu mchaal xaa kwerp cheen Jesús ler kwaan mrub anseyt kwaan chul nzebech zee cho, mod nle re nu kwaan xaa nzhet.
Nel lee re gu mlesla ne re xaa nzho lozhyib, nu nyakla gu gorna mlewann xaa re kwaan nkano gu, nel nela gu lee naz yiba nkano gu kwaan mas chul nu kwaan tira ndii.
Leeka lo xben David myaad Jesús, xaa ne mxaal Dios koo re sawlazh be lo yalgut, nu zee zaa xaa yalnaban kwaan tira, kwentaxa nzhéla xaa yilo.

Kwaanzee snee nzhé Xkyech Dios: Dios nkano re kwaan chul nu nzaa xaaya lo re xaa nkela xaa, re kwaan nik tub xaa zer ne lo, nu re kwaan nik tub xaa zer gon nu re kwaan nik tub xaa zer le xgab. [Is. 64:4]
Nu chelee Mbi Naban cheen Dios, xaa mseban Jesucrist, nzho lextoo be, leeka xaa zaa stub yalnaban kwaan kub lo kwerp cheen be, nebse kwaan Mbi Naban cheen xaa.
Nu Mbi Naban ne mbezh lo mbi naban cheen be lee be nak xinn Dios.
Nakadet gu leeka gu, nik tub xaa nyent mod kitno Dios. Leezha ngo xaa bizh lo yo zee ntop xaa kwaan mgaan xaa.

Bwii, lee Dios nak tub xaa nlesdoola ne re myet. Nlesla xaa ne xaa gu chelee gu nze gu lo yalnkela cheen xaa, per nalestla xaa ne xaa rese xaa nanzhont xtizh xaa. Kwaanzee chelee gu nazet gu lo yalnkela cheen xaa, gak gu kwent ram kwaan mchoog xaa lo xkyag xaa.
Kwaanzee rese be wech nu bzan, ye be xep axta gorna bare Xaa Nabeyy. ¿Che nanet gu xomod naka leezha nzhaan xaa? Mbaz xaa la yey zee nzho mod le xaa gan koo xaa yalgon kwaan chul doo gak.
Nzhekla na lee Xaa Nabeyy les lextoo ne Onesíforo nu re sawlizh xaa, nel nixa nzhoo na lozhyib, nu nantont xaa ne xaa na. Zyen doo welt mbiid xaa mseleyy xaa na.
Kwaanzee rese gu, xaa mod xiin na, nkin tubka zo be kwaan Jesucrist. Zee gorna yaad xaa stub welt, zee nazhebt be ne be xaa, nu natont be ne be xaa.
Kwaan nii na lo gu nak: Le be kwaan nzhekla Mbi Naban nu nalet be re kwaan nzhekla kwerp cheen be.
“Lee Jesucrist myaad lo yizhyo ne mkiib jwalt cheen re myet.” Kwaane nak kwaan wli, nu rese xaa nzhaal gona. Nu na nak tub xaa mas mzebra jwalt lo re xaa.
Lee nal nii na lo gu, gok gu tub xaa ngezh kwaan yalngezh cheen Xaa Nabeyy.
Kwaanzee chelee be nzak be nali nzo be, kanapka be be napaka le be tub kwaan nawent.
Nel Jesucrist kwaan tubka gon, tira mle nzhul xaa re xaa Dios.
Lee re xaa mbare mzen ke kee yenn xaa stub welt,
Per nzhekla na, zeen gu lee Jesucrist nabeyy rese xaabyi, nu xaabyi nabeyy ngwnaa, modxa Dios nabeyy Jesucrist.
Zlak xaa mloo re xaa xkyalnto, nu mzaa xaaya yenn xaa, nu mkado xaa xaa kwaan kaden lozhyib.

Nu kwaan nkambaz be nle zee nye nzo be lo Dios zee nik tub kwaan nagakt be; leeya nak mod tub yiib kwaan nsekwaz tub bark leen nistoo zee zheta nzob bark. Nu kwaane nle zee nzho mod zhin be axta stub ta ler kwaan nsaaw leen yidoo cheen Dios, zee zhin be lo Dios.
Nu nalet be re kwaan nle re xaa kwaan nzo lo yalnakaw, mas wen zaa be kwent cheena zee zeen re xaaya.
Rese gu wech nu bzan, nagawyixt be tub be stub be. Nu cheleeya nzhawyix be tub be stub be, nlu nanzhont be ley cheen Dios. Nu chelee be nanzhont be ley cheen Dios, nlu leeka be nzhekla nabeyy loya.
Nu lee re chiibchop pwert nak chiibchop ke kwaan le perla. Nu lee kay cheen yezh nak nebse or, mod tub lee bidr kwaan nded benin.

Per Jesucrist, nak mer Xgann Dios, nak xaa tub xaa nali lo re xaa Dios, xaa nak re be. Nu nak be xaa xaa, chelee be kwaan dub lextoo be, ngwii be lo kwaan nkambaz be axta kayaa beya, nu nyakla be zaa be kwent cheena.
Kela be tub be stub be kwaan dub lextoo be. Laa be re kwaan nawent, nu reke be tich re kwaan wen.

Nu leeka gorzee gun tub xog kwaan nye doo, nu kwent cheen xog lux tub part lo chii part cheen yezh nu yet gazh mil xaa. Lee re xaa mbanaka, kwaan yalnacheb gool xaa lo Dios nu yé xaa: —Lu nak Xaa Nabeyy, xaa nzob naz yiba.
Per leezha nzhé Dios lo Abraham le xaa kwaan chul, mer lee xaa nzhéya, nu namkint xaa tub xaa mzo xsaww lo rop xaa, nel Dios nak tubka.
Pilat nzhé: —¿Chozhiin nankebt lu lo na? ¿Che nanet lu nkano na yalnabeyy kee na lu lo krus, nu nkano na yalnabeyy sela na lu?
Lee kwaan kalab xaa nak kwaane: Wee xaa xaa kwenta tub mbakxiil lo yalgut, nu kwenta tub mbakxiil leezha nchub xaa yich led ma nambazhet ma, nixa lee xaa naniit nik tub wdizh.
Zee lee re xaa ngunaab tub rey zee nabeyy xaa xaa; nu lee Dios mleyy Saúl, xinn Cis lo xaa, xaa nak dii cheen Benjamín. Nu mnabeyy xaa lo re xaa tub choo liin.

Sbaa nzhaal gak xaa, nel nzho zyen doo xaa nanzaat yek gon diizh, nu lo re xaa ne, mas ned nak re xaa mbezh nkin yo rese xaa Jesús beyy cheen re nu; xaa ne nii re kwaan nanont, nu nebse nkade xaa re myet.
Nu lo ler nzho rete ma, nu re mball, nu re mbyin.
Nu mza na re kwaan chul lo xaa mod mzaa luya lo na, zee gak re xaa ne tubka, snee modxa nak lu nu na tubka.
Tubka breke tich kwaan nali modxa mlu naya lo lu; nel tubka ngwii lu lo Jesucrist, nu nel tubka nkela lu re myet.
Baa nzhi tub xop yas ke, kwaan ngo re nu nis leen leezha nle nzhul nu nu lo Dios. Nu leen kad tub yas nyu tub tapgal o tub gayoo litr nis.
Ble gu xgab kwaan wli, nu nalet gu kwaan nawent, nel nzho xaa nanlabeyyt Dios. Nii na kwaane zee ton gu.
Natot gu yalxwa, nadoo gok gu, byela gu ne gu tub gu stub gu, mod nzhaal kela gu tub gu stub gu,
Nu le be yudar re xaa, mod tub xaa mloo xaa lo ki. Nu lesla be ne be re xaa, per noka nkin kanap be be lo xaa, nu yii be ne be re kwaan nawent kwaan nle xaa.
Nela be lee Dios nle zee rese kwaan chul reke lo re xaa nkela Dios, re xaa mrezh Dios kwentaxa nzhekla Dios.
Rese xaa nzho nee, ne lee re gu nak xaa nzhon xtizh Dios nu kwaanzee nyakla na; nu nzhekla na seed gu le gu rese kwaan wen, nu nalet gu re kwaan nawent.

baa nzho tub mdo kwaan nak or, pa nzek ngwleyy yaal, nu nzho kaj cheen wdizh yilo kwaan mteeb xaa or dub cho. Nu leen kaj ne nzho tub luunch kwaan or kwaan nzho maná leen, nu noka nzho garrot cheen Aarón leena kwaan mzaa yeey, nu rop ke kwaan nkee ley lo.
Kwaanzee, ¿paro nlake yalxwa cheen myet lo Dios? ¡Mluxa! Nel nyent mod zo xaa nali lo Dios nel ngozhaw xaa ley cheen Dios; kwaanzee nebse xaa ngwii lo Jesucrist nzho mod zo nali lo Dios.
¿Che nanlet lu krer lee Xuz na nzo kwaan na nu na nzo kwaan Xuz na? Lee re kwaan nii na naniit naya kwent cheen na. Rese kwaan nle na nak xcheen Xuz na nel lee Xuz na tubka nzo kwaan na.
Nu noka zyen doo myet ngaazh kwaan tich Pab nu tich Silas. Nu lee re xaa nak zhiin mnabeyy koche xaa xab Pab rop Silas zee zaa bar xaa xaa.
Nu tub kwaan kub nabeey na lo gu le gu nal: Bkela gu tub gu stub gu, kwentaxa nkela na re gu, sbaaka nzhaal kela gu tub gu stub gu.
Lo yizhyo ne lee kwerp cheen be nak mod tub ramad kwaan nlux. Per nela be gorna luxa, Dios zaa stuba kwaan tira naluxt lo be naz leen yiba, kwaan nak mod tub yoo kwaan namdexkwaat myet.
Jesús ngunii dublegan nzhé: —Loka xaa nzhon kwaan nii na, nanzhont xaa nebse kwaan nii na sinka noka nzhon xaa kwaan nii Xuz na, xaa mxaal na.
Nu gorna mbin Ananías kwaane, zee nzhé xaa: —Xaa Nabeyy, zyen doo xaa nzaa kwent cheen xaa ba nu rese kwaan nawent kwaan mle xaa lo re xaa mle nambey lu, naz Jerusalén.

nel snee gak re myet: to doo xaa yalxwa, zoblazh xaa demi, le xaa mod tub xaa non doo, nii nawent xaa re wechxinn xaa, nagont xaa xtizh xuz xaa nu xtizh xnaa xaa, nazaat xaa dixkix, nixa nazhebt xaa ne xaa Dios.
Nu nalsi, nzhul ngok be lo re jwalt cheen be nel ngut Jesucrist, nu Jesucrist la be lo yalnayii cheen Dios.
Kwaanzee mlu Jesucrist kwaane lo na nu lee xaa nak Xaa Nabeyy na; wena nzho mod gaw be rese kwaan, per chelee tub be nzak nawenta, nazhaalt gaw xaaya.
Chelee lu seed lu re xaa Jesús kwaane, zeesi gak lu tub mos wen doo cheen Jesucrist. Nel ngok nye lu lo Dios kwent cheen xomod ngwii lu lo Jesucrist nu kwent cheen re kwaan wli kwaan nzhake lu tich.
